He needs the loan to buy merchandise to stock his business.  He will buy things like oil, rice, beans, sugar, and soap.  This way he will have more sales opportunities and customers.

Joaquín’s dream is for his children to continue with their education and this way help with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, beans, sugar, and soap for his store.

loans.name: Fátima Leonor

texts.es:
Fátima de 35 años, una mujer trabajadora que siempre se inspira y sale adelante por sus hijos.

Comenzó su negocio hace tres meses con la ayuda de su cuñada que le pudo prestar su local en las noches.

El horario que inicia su labor es de 7:00pm hasta 10:00pm con la venta de comida.

Se inició en la venta de comida porque se dio cuenta que tenia el arte de la cocinas en la manos  desde los veinte años.

Solicita el préstamo para la compra de vivieres como: papas, tomate, cebolla, etc.

El sueño de ella es tener su local propio de comida, que sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios y que tenga un buen vivir.
texts.en:
Fátima is 35 years old. She is a hard-working woman who is always inspired and working to move ahead in life for her children's sake.

She began her business three months ago with the help of her sister-in-law, who was able to provide her with her premises in the evenings.  She works from 7 p.m. to 10 p.m selling meals.  She began selling food because she realized that for the last 20 years, she has had the art of cooking at her fingertips.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of ingredients such as potatoes, tomatoes, onions, etc.

Her dream is to have her own food premises,and that her children can complete their education and have a good life.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatoes, glasses, etc.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, vive junto con su esposa y dos hijos, él tiene una tienda de productos básicos (arroz, frijoles, azúcar, maíz, aceite),el negocio surgio por iniciativa propia hace 16 años,todos los días trabaja no tiene un horario establecido ya que el negocio esta en su vivienda y por lo mismo atiende a los clientes a cualquier hora.
El préstamo lo utilizara para crecer más su tienda  y comprar más mercadería como: azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite, arina de maíz de esa forma mejorara su negocio y  obtendrá mejores ingresos.
El sueño de Luis  es  incrementar  sus ventas y  tendrá más variedad y cubrir sus obligaciones  y que su familia viva bien.
texts.en:
Luis lives with his wife and two children.  He has a store selling basic goods, ( rice, beans, sugar, corn, oil) he started it out of his own initiative 16 years ago.  He works everyday and has no established hours since the business is out of his home, which is why he tends to customers at any hour.

The loan would be used to expand his store and purchase more merchandise such as: sugar, rice, beans, oil, cornstarch, and this way improve the business and increase his earnings.

Luis has a dream to increase sales and have more variety and to also fulfill his obligations and have his family living better.

loans.use: To purchase basic products for the store: sugar, rice, beans, oil, cornstarch

loans.name: Amancia Isabel

texts.es:
Amancia de 55 años, es una mujer trabajadora  que quiere incrementar en su negocio.

Con el préstamo anterior ha podido iniciar su negocio, con la ayuda de Dios ella quiere  solicitar un nuevo préstamo para agrandar y surtir su negocio.

El sueño de es incrementar en su negocio y abrir nuevos locales de farmacia en otros sectores de la urbe.

El fin de ella es que sus hijos tengan un buen vivir.
texts.en:
Amancia is a 55 year working woman who wants to increase her business. With her last loan she was able to begin her business. 

With the help of God, she is asking for a new loan in order to enlarge her business and supply it. 

Her dream is to grow her business and open new pharmacies in other areas of the city. All of this is for her children, so they will have a good life.

loans.use: to buy medicines to supply her pharmacy

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y dos hijos,ella se dedica a vender mariscos (conchas, curiles, camarones),el oficio lo inicio hace varios años, todos los días venD. no tiene un horario establecido.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar más mercadería (conchas, punches, curiles, camarones, pescado) para mejorar en las ventas y tener  variedad y aumentar en clientela.
El propósito D. María es que sus ingresos aumenten, tener más clientes y satisfacer las espectativas D. ellos.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her husband and two children.  She sells shellfish ( oysters, clams, shrimp) and started the business years ago and she sells everyday with no established hours.

She will utilize the loan to purchase more merchandise ( oysters, crab, clams, shrimp, fish) in order to improve sales and have more variety and more customers.
Maria's goal is to increase her sales, have more customers, and to satisfy people's expectations of the business.

loans.use:
Compra de pescado, camarones, conchas.
To purchase fish, shrimp, shellfish

loans.name: Lorena Nancy

texts.es:
Lorena de 56 años, una mujer trabajadora que inicio su negocio hace 6 años.

Trabaja en un pequeño comedor, que poco a poco ha salido adelante.

Su negocio inicia a las 6am hasta las 7pm.

Su dificultad es la delincuencia  de su sector.
  
Solicita el préstamo para invertir en el negocio y comprar materiales de construcción para terminar su vivienda. 
 
Su sueño es expandir su negocio y que sus hijos tengan un buen  bienestar económico.
texts.en: Lorena, 56, is a hardworking woman who started her business six years ago.  She works in a small eatery that has gradually made progress.  Her work day is from 6am to 7pm.  The difficulty she faces is crime in her neighborhood.  She’s asking for the loan to invest in her business and to buy building materials and supplies to finish her house.  Her dream is to expand her business and that her children have good economic wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Idalia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Idalia, esta solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, el cual lo utilizara para crecer más su tienda  y comprar más mercadería como: azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite,bebidas, de esa forma obtendrá mejores ingresos.
El sueño de Idalia  es  incrementar  sus ventas y  tendrá más variedad y cubrir sus obligaciones y salir adelante con su familia.Por eso acude al apoyo crediticio, ya que le ha ayudado hasta la fecha para mejorar su situacion economica y el comercio de los productos.
texts.en: Idalia is once again requesting a loan to make her store grow more and to buy more merchandise like: rice, sugar, beans, oil and beverages to earn more income.  Idalia’s dream is to increase sales and have more variety to meet her obligations and get ahead with her family.  Because of this she’s seeking financial support since it’s helped her to date to improve her economic situation and to sell the products.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, beans, oil and beverages for the business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bread baking raw materials.

loans.name: Ladis Carolina

texts.es:
Ladis de 42 años, una mujer trabajadora que cada día trata seguir adelante.

Es una vendedora de cosméticos, poco a poco fue desarrollándose con las ventas de sus productos.

En la actualidad vende su productos mediante de catálogos como revistas a sus vecinos y amigos.

Tiene muchas aspiraciones en su negocio. Por eso ella solicita este préstamo para la compra de productos como: perfumes, cremas, etc.

Su sueño es que su clientela aumente y así que pueda mejorar cada día como vendedora de cosméticos.
texts.en: Ladis, 42, is a hardworking woman who strives to get ahead daily.  She sells cosmetics; she gradually developed in sales of these products.  At present, she sells her items via printed catalogues among her neighbors and friends.  She has many hopes for her business and this is why she’s asking for a loan to buy products like perfume, creams, etc.  Her dream is that her clientele grows so that she can improve daily as a cosmetics saleswoman.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana, vive con su esposo y dos hijos D. 14 y 18 años ella se dedica a vender mariscos pescado fresco D. diferentes clases, curiles, camarones, en el mercado del pueblo, el oficio lo inicio hace varios años, todos los días venD..
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar más mariscos, filetes D. pescado, langostas, camarones para mejorar en las ventas y tener  variedad y aumentar en clientela.
El propósito D. Juana es que sus ingresos aumenten tener más clientes y obtener más  ganancias.
texts.en:
Juana lives with her husband and two children who are 14 and 18 years old. She sells various kinds of fresh seafood such as shellfish including shrimp in the town market. She began this business some years ago and she works every day.

This loan will be used to buy more seafood, fish fillets, lobster and shrimp in order to increas her sales and to have a variety to offer which will increase her customer base.

Juana wants to increase her profits and to have more clients, which will help her earn more money.

loans.use: to buy fish fillets, lobsters, and shrimp

loans.name: David Francisco

texts.es:
David de 56 años, es casado vive con su esposa, padre de tres hijos.

Trabaja en un pequeño comedor, que poco a poco ha salido adelante.

Con la ayuda de un capital ah podido invertir en el negocio, con la compra de dos mesas y 4 sillas, que no son suficientes para el negocio. 

Solicita el préstamo para invertir en el negocio e incrementar en los productos de comida como: arroz, bebidas, aceites, frutas, entre otros como: sillas y mesas.

Su sueño es expandir su negocio en un local más grande, ya que el alquila un pequeño local ubicado en la parte esquinera de su vivienda.
texts.en: David, 56, is married living with his wife; he’s the father of three children.  He works in a small eatery that has gradually gotten ahead.  With help from a bit of capital he was able to invest in the business buying two tables and four chairs but they are insufficient for the business. He asks for the loan to invest in the business and increase the ingredients for the food like rice, beverages, oil, fruit, among others and also for tables and chairs. His dream to expand the business in a larger locale since he rents a small locale located at the corner of his house.

loans.use: to buy chairs, rice and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy perfumes to increase the stock her business carries.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
Ana, vive con sus dos hijos de 5 y 3 años, ella  tiene una tienda (chalet) y venta de pupusas, de productos básicos (churros, galletas, dulces, pan,) inicio el negocio por sus padres, todos los días trabaja no tiene un horario establecido.
El préstamo lo utilizara para crecer más su tienda y comprar más mercadería como: churros, galleta, dulces, pan, jugos y gaseosas,  de esa forma obtendrá mejores ingresos.
El sueño de Ana  es  incrementar  sus ventas y  tendrá más variedad y más surtido para seguir obteniendo  ganancias y podrá darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her two children who are 5 and 3 years of age.  She has a store (chalet) selling basic items (churros, cookies, candy, bread).  She started the business through her parents.  She works every day and does not have a fixed work schedule.

She will use the loan to make her store grow more and to buy merchandise like: churros, cookies, candy, bread, juice and soft-drinks to earn more income.

Ana’s dream is to increase sales and to have more variety and more stock available to continue earning profits to provide the best for her children.

loans.use: to buy cookies, candy, bread, juice and soft-drinks.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Mónica de 30 años de edad, convive con Alberto de 35 años, con quien tiene 2 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Sivia. Cuando Mónica tenía 25 años, contaba con un pequeño restaurante, donde expendía diversos platos a gusto del cliente, con este negocio estuvieron casi dos años, donde lograron recaudar un capital como para poder emprender un nuevo negocio. Actualmente se dedica en la venta de pollos a la brasa, negocio que le esta yendo bien, debido a la buena sazón con esta preparado, eso le da más ventaja para ganar más gente. En un inicio su local no estaba muy amoblado, pero poco a poco fue comprando lo que faltaba e iba decorando el ambiente, hoy está súper feliz con este negocio gracias a las recomendaciones de sus clientes, quienes le dieron la idea de emprender éste trabajo. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,500 soles, comprará utensilios de cocina que tanto le hace falta.
texts.en:
Mónica, 30, lives with Alberto, 35, with whom she has two children.  They all live together in their own house located in Sivia District.  

When Mónica was 25 years old she opened a small restaurant where she’d sell various dishes according to her customers’ wishes.  They had this business for about two years and were able to gather capital together to start a new business.  At present, she sells grilled chicken, a business she’s doing well in thanks to her tasty preparation which is an advantage for her to attract more customers.  

At the beginning, it wasn’t furnished very well but she gradually bought what she needed and decorated the environment.  Today, she is super happy with this business thanks to the recommendations of her customers who gave her the idea to start this business.

This will be her first MFP loan so she commits to make her installment payments punctually.  She will use the 1500 soles to buy the kitchen utensils she so very much needs.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Felix Angel

texts.es:
Félix de 49 años, un hombre trabajador  que ha sabido salir adelante con sus hijos y con aspiraciones de crecimiento en su negocio.

Su negocio es una pequeña tienda ubicada en la parte delantera  de su vivienda.

Su negocio inicia desde las 6am hasta las 22pm. Su dificultad es la delincuencia de su sector.

El solicita este préstamo para expandir su negocio e invertir para la compra de víveres como: arroz, aceite, pollos, etc.

Su sueño es expandir su negocio a otras partes de Guayaquil, en donde pueda dar empleos.
texts.en: Félix, 49, is a hardworking man who has known how to get ahead with his children and with hopes for his business’ growth.  His business is a small store located in the front part of his house.  The store is open from 6am until 10pm.  His problem is the crime in his neighborhood.  He asks for the loan to expand the business investing in the purchase of foodstuffs like rice, oil, chickens, etc.  His dream is to expand the business into other parts of Guayaquil where he can provide jobs.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil and chickens.

loans.name: Evelyn Paola

texts.es:
Evelyn 30 años, una mujer emprendedora que ha sabido como ganarse la confianza de sus clientes.

Su negocio es la venta de calzados como: sandalias, zapatos de hombre y de mujer.

Comenzó  con poca mercadería que gracias a Dios ha ido incrementado, ahora a ella le gusta el comercio.El trabajo de ella lo realiza por las mañanas  en un pequeño local que ella alquila.
 
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en mercadería y así con el dinero sobrante la compra de un local.

El sueño de ella es tener un local propio e ir incrementado en su negocio.
texts.en: Evelyn, 30, is an enterprising woman who has known how to gain the trust of her customers.  Her business is footwear sales: sandals and shoes for men and women.  She started out with not much merchandise but thanks to God it’s been increasing and now she likes commerce.  She works during the morning in a small locale she rents.  She asked for the loan to invest in merchandise and with the money that’s left over to buy a locale.  Her dream is to have a locale of her own and to gradually enlarge the business.

loans.use: to buy sandals and shoes.

loans.name: Jose Domingo

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos, él se dedica desde hace muchos años a la siembra de granos básicos como el maíz, su padre le enseño a trabajar, lo realiza todos los días de lunes a domingo.
El necesita el préstamo para comprar herbicidas para las plagas, semilla y abono, para que sus cosechas sean abundantes  de las cuales pueda disponer para su familia y para comercializar.
El sueño de José es que sus hijos sigan estudiando y darle lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and four children.  He has been growing basic grains such as corn for many years.  His father taught him to work and he carries out his work every day, from Monday to Sunday.

José needs this loan to buy herbicides to protect his crops from pests, seeds and manure.  This will provide him with abundant harvests, part of which he will use for his own family's consumption and part of which he will sell.

José's dream is for his children to continue studying and to provide his family with what they need.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, seeds and manure

loans.name: Leida Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor de 25 años, es una trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones de crecimiento en su negocio.

Ella brinda servicios de internet en la cuál realiza trabajos como: investigaciones, escaneo, etc.

Su negocio empezó hace 8 meses, ahora ella cuenta con dos computadoras  para realizar más tareas en internet, su horario de atención es de lunes a  domingo de 9am hasta las 7pm.

Ella solicita este préstamo para invertir más en su negocio e incrementar su área de trabajo.

El sueño de ella es mejorar su negocio e implementar más accesorios de trabajo de internet.
texts.en:
Leonor, 25, is a worker who wants her business to grow.

She offers internet service such as research, scanning, etc.  She started her business eight months ago.  Now she has two computers to do more internet work.  Her work schedule is from Monday through Sunday from 9 a.m. until 7 p.m.

She is requesting this loan to invest more in her business and increase her area of work.

Her dream is to improve her business and implement more accessibility to internet work.

loans.use: to buy a monitor, a printer, and keyboards.

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es:
Maria, Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para compra de pantalones jeans, camisas, ropa interior de hombre y ropa femenina, la compra le ayudara para incrementar el inventario y salir a visitar a los clientes con nueva mercadería.
El sueño de María es en el futuro tener un local fijo donde pueda exhibir sus productos a la clientela, ella manifiesta que por el record crediticio que ya tiene, lograra a traves de un prestamo su sueño, de tener un local fijo y adecuado, para generar una mayor afluencia de clientes al negocio.
texts.en:
Maria is currently requesting a loan to buy pants, jeans, shirts, men's underwear and women's clothing.  This purchase will help her to increase her stock and enable her to go out to visit her customers with new merchandise.  

María's dream for the future is to have a fixed sales location where she can display her products for her customers.  Owing to the credit history that she  has, María states that she will use a loan to achieve her dream of having a fixed, suitable sales location so that she can attract a larger number of customers to her business.

loans.use: to buy jeans, t-shirts, men's underwear and women's clothing

loans.name: Mariana Catalina

texts.es:
Mariana de 31 años, es una mujer trabajadora que inició su negocio hace 5 años. La profesión de ella es vendedora de cosméticos de uso personal.

El negocio de ella inicia a las 4:00 pm termina a las 6:00 pm, posteriormente inicia su otra actividad que es de cuidar niños.

Solicita este préstamo para invertir en su negocio e incrementar los productos que vende en su negocio como: perfumes, cremas, desodorantes.

Su sueño es terminar de construir su vivienda e incrementar más su negocio.
texts.en:
Mariana is 31 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who started her business five years ago.  Her business is selling cosmetics and personal care products.

Mariana is requesting this loan to invest in her business and to increase the range of products that she sells such as perfume, creams and deodorants.

Mariana's dream is to finish building her home and to further increase her business.

loans.use: to buy perfume, deodorants and creams

loans.name: Blanca Beatriz

texts.es:
Blanca, vive con sus padres y su hijo de 10 años, tiene un comedor donde ofrece desayunos, almuerzos y cena, y también vende tortillas, desde hace varios  años tiene este negocio, lo atiende todos los días de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar sillas y mesas para el comedor, para dar una mejor comodidad a sus clientes y de esa forma mejora en  sus ingresos.
El sueño de Blanca es crecer en su negocio, para obtener más utilidades y en el futuro comprar un lote para hacer su propia casa.
texts.en:
Blanca lives with her parents and her 10-year-old son.  She has a small restaurant where she serves breakfast, lunch and dinner.  She also sells tortillas.  She has had this business for several years and works in it every day, from Monday to Sunday.

Blanca will use her loan to buy tables and chairs for her small restaurant so that she can make her customers more comfortable and thereby improve her income.

Blanca's dreams are to grow her business, to make more profits and, in the future, to buy a plot of land so that she can build her own home.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction material such as: blocks, iron and labor.

loans.name: Fatima Yaneth

texts.es:
Fátima, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos 5,8 y 13 años, ella administra una  pupuseria:donde ofrece pupusas  de queso, chicharon, revueltas y bebidas como gaseosas, chocolate y refrescos, todos los días por las tardes realiza la venta  y tambien vende tortillas sábado y domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar los productos básicos, materia prima como (maíz, quesillo chicharon, cacao) y comprar leña,  de esa forma podrá tener iempre lo necesario para mantener el negocio.
El sueño de Fátima es que el negocio crezca y poder aumentar en el negocio y tener lo necesario para vivir mejor y que su familia este tranquila.
texts.en: Fátima is a single mother. She has three children aged 5, 8 and 13. She runs a pupuseria where she sells chicken and pork pupusas, 'pupusas revueltas' (pupusas filled with cheese, beans and chopped pork), soda, hot chocolate and soft drinks. She sells her products every afternoon and also sells tortillas on Saturdays and Sundays. Fátima will use this loan to buy the basic products she needs (raw materials such as corn, soft cheese, chopped pork and cacao). She will also buy firewood. This will enable her to always have what she needs available so that she can keep her business running. Fátima's dream is to grow and increase her business so that she has what she needs in order to for her family to live more comfortably and peacefully.

loans.use: to buy corn, soft cheese, chopped pork, cacao and firewood

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y su hija, el es sastre, elabora, pantalones, camisas, para niños y caballeros, desde hace 12 años trabaja en este oficio, lo aprendió en talleres de alta costura y ahora tiene su propio taller, no tiene un horario establecido.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar material para elaboración de informes escolares como telas de diferentes colores, botones, hilos, agujas, de esa forma tendrá lo necesario para terminar los pedidos y obtener ante los clientes mejor preferencia por la puntualidad.
El propósito de José, es salir con el contrato de informes de las escuelas y a si asegurar el nuevo contrato para los próximos años y seguir trabajando con la institución para futuros préstamos, que le permitan ayudar a su familia con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and daughter.  He’s a tailor.  He makes pants and shirts for children and men.  

He’s been in this occupation for 12 years.  He learned working in haute couture shops and now he has his own shop; he does not have a fixed work schedule.

He will use the loan to buy supplies like different color fabric, buttons, thread and needles to manufacture school uniforms and have what he needs to complete his orders and obtain more customer preference because of his punctuality.

Jose’s goal is to get ahead with the school uniform contract to assure new contracts in the years to come and continue working with the institution for future loans that will allow him to help with family expenses.

loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons and thread to manufacure uniforms.

loans.name: Blanca Norma

texts.es:
Blanca de 50 años, una mujer muy empeñosa en su profesión. La actividad de ella es comercializar todo tipo  de ropa sea de hombre o de mujer.

Su actividad comienza de  9am hasta las  7pm, la dificultad de ella es la delincuencia de su sector donde vive.
Ella solicita este préstamo para invertir en su negocio e incrementar más la comercialización de su mercadería y para la compra de la misma.

El sueño de ella es mejorar su vivienda y tener un local fijo para la venta de su mercadería.
texts.en: Blanca, 50, is a woman who is very dedicated to her work.  She sells all sorts of clothes for men and women.  She starts her work day at 9am and goes until 7pm.  The difficulty she faces is crime in her neighborhood.  She’s asking for this loan to invest in the business buying clothes to increase sales.  Her dream is to improve her house and have a fixed locale to sell her merchandise in.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men and women.

loans.name: Liliana Janeth

texts.es:
Liliana de 26 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora que siempre piensa positivamente en el futuro de sus hijos.
A pesar de que su marido no le guste que ella trabaje, ella ah sabido manifestarle que el dinero que gana el no es suficiente para mantener a la familia.

Ella es una vendedora de cosméticos que vende productos  como: perfumes, cremas, desodorante, etc.

El problema de ella es el sector donde vive  ya que es de difícil  acceso para llegar a su vivienda.
Solicita este préstamo para invertir más en su venta de cosmético y que su negocio incremente.

El sueño de ella es terminar su casa y apoyar a su esposo en la economía del hogar.
texts.en: Liliana, 26, is a very hardworking woman who always thinks positively in the future of her children.  Despite her husband not liking her to work, she’s known how to show him that what he earns isn’t enough to support the family.  She sells cosmetics; she sells such things as perfume, creams, deodorants, etc.  Her problem is that access to her house in the area where she lives is difficult.  She’s asking for this loan to invest more in her cosmetics sales so that the business will grow.  Her dream is to finish her house and help her husband with household economy.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Oscar Hermogenes

texts.es:
Oscar, vive con su esposa y su suegra, el tiene un taller de estructuras metálicas hace puertas de metal y ventanas, el oficio lo aprendió hace seis años, ahora tiene su propio taller, trabaja todos los días, no tiene un horario establecido.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar herramientas: pintura, chapas, tubos y  soldadores, de esa forma obtendrá mejores resultados y más ingresos.
El propósito de Oscar es siempre mantener su negocio estable, tener lo necesario para la vida diaria y pagar el crédito con buen record  y que su familia tenga mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Oscar lives with his wife and mother-in-law.   He has a metal shop where he makes metal doors and windows.  He learned this skill six years ago and now has his own shop.  He works every day and does not have a fixed work schedule.  He needs the loan to buy tools: paint, hinges, tubes and solder to obtain better results and more income.  Oscar’s goal is to always keep his business stable, to have everything needed for daily life, to repay the loan with a good record and that his family has the best living conditions.

loans.use: to buy paint, hinges, tubes and solder.

loans.name: Veronica Alexandra

texts.es:
Verónica de 31 años, es una mujer trabajadora que hace 10 años empezó su negocio con un préstamo familiar. Con este pequeño capital pudo abrir un pequeño bazar que poco a poco ah ido creciendo.

El negocio inicia a las 6 am y termina a las 8 pm. Su esposo la ayuda en el negocio.

Su dificultad es la delincuencia. Hace dos semanas asaltaron a un carro repartidor de productos que le entregaban a su negocio.

Solicita este préstamo para invertir en su negocio e incrementar los productos que se vende en su negocio como: cuaderno, lápiz, borradores, etc.

Su sueño es terminar de construir su vivienda y que sus hijos puedan terminar sus carreras escolares.
texts.en: Verónica, 31, is a hardworking woman who started her business ten years ago with a family loan.  With this small capital she was able to open a small store that has been gradually growing.  She starts work at 6am and finishes at 8pm.  Her husband helps her in the store.  Her difficulty is crime.  Two weeks ago a delivery truck bringing merchandise to her store was held up.  She’s asking for this loan to invest in the business and increase the products she sells there like notebooks, pencils, erasers, etc.  Her dream is to finish building her house and that her children are able to finish their schooling.

loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Efren Flor (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Efrén Flor se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.

Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal que les sirve de mucho ya que con los créditos ellos pueden mejorar sus pequeños negocios que tienen. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.
 
En este lugar conocimos a la señora Rosa, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos,  todos son mayores de edad y a pesar de que uno de ellos es casado  aun viven con ella todos sus hijos. Su esposo es chofer.

Es una ama de casa muy luchadora y trabadora que para ganar algo por su cuenta y contribuir en los gastos D. hogar se dedica al comercio,  vende ropa de todo tipo, zapatos, joyería de Romanel y cosméticos de Avon, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta. Trabaja dos días a la semana en la entrega de sus productos y  cobra todos los fines de semana. Tiene 3 años que se dedica a este negocio y espera mejorarlo con los créditos que ahora recibe de la institución.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: ropa, zapatos, joyas de Romanel y cosméticos Avon. Este es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la rapidez con que salen los créditos.
 
Su sueño es incrementar más su negocio.
texts.en:
The Efrén Flor communal bank meets every two weeks in the parish of Picoaza in the city of Portoviejo. This place is known for being a very commercial area, for its traditional festivals of St. Peter and St. Paul, and for the happiness of its people. 

This is a group of people who decided to unite and form this communal bank that helps them very much, since with the loans they can improve their small businesses. They engage in various activities such as business, services, and food sales, among others. 

In this place we meet Rosa, 51. She is married. She and her husband have three children, all of whom are adults, and despite the fact that one of them is married, all of her children still live with her. Her husband is a driver.

She is a housewife, very hard-working and a fighter, who engages in business in order to earn something herself and contribute towards the household expenses. She sells clothing of all kinds, shoes, Romanel jewelry, and Avon cosmetics. Her method of selling is door-to-door. She works weekdays delivering her products and she collects money every weekend. She has had this business for 3 years and she hopes to improve it with the loans that she is now receiving from the institution.

She will use this loan to purchase more merchandise such as: clothing, shoes, Romanel jewelry, and Avon cosmetics. This is her first cycle in the communal bank, and she likes it because of the speed with which the loans go out.

Her dream is to further increase her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, jewelry, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Dinia Aleida

texts.es:
Dinia, es madre soltera, vive junto con sus dos hijos y su abuelo, ella  tiene una tienda de productos básicos (arroz, frijoles, azúcar, maíz), el negocio surgio por iniciativa propia, todos los días trabaja, no tiene un horario establecido.
El préstamo lo utilizara para crecer más su tienda  y comprar más mercadería como: boquitas, galleta, arroz, frijoles, de esa forma obtendrá mejores ingresos.
El sueño de Dinia  es  incrementar  sus ventas y  tener más variedad; seguir teniendo créditos a futuro para trabajar con la institución y de esa forma poder darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: Dinia is a single mother living with her two children and her grandfather.  She has a grocery store (rice, beans, sugar, corn) that she opened on her own initiative.  She works every day and does not have a fixed work schedule.  She will use the loan to make her store grows and to buy more merchandise like snacks, cookies, rice and beans to earn better income.  Dinia’s dream is to increase sales and have more variety, to continue to have future loans to work with the institution and thus be able to provide her family with all the best.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: Irene tiene 46 años, casado con Gerardo de 52 años, con quien tiene 2 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Sivia. Irene se dedica a la venta de golosinas en el cafetín del colegio "Gervasio Santillana". En un comienzo no sabia nada de lo que es un negocio, pero gracias a la enseñanza de sus padres supo enfrentarlo, Sin embargo, no le era suficiente, por ello monto un mostrador para vender golosinas, desde entonces sus ganancias aumentaron. El trato amable y la variedad de productos que ofrecen le han dado mucha ventaja para captar clientela. Se siente muy entusiasmada por haber incursionado en el negocio, lo que ahora desea es abrir una tienda de abarrotes, donde pueda surtir sus productos, y pueda vender cereales, vegetales, carnicería y especias. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en ser efectivo  el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1.500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de nuevos productos para su cafetín.
texts.en: Irene, 46, is married to Gerardo, 52, and they have two children.  They all live together in her own house located in Sivia District.  Irene sells snacks at her school’s snack bar.  At the beginning she didn’t know anything about what business was like but thanks to her parents’ teaching she was able to face it.  However, it was not enough for her so she set up a counter to sell snacks and since then profits increased.  The kind treatment and assorted products she offers have been very advantageous for her to win over customers.  She is very excited about having gone into the business and now Irene wants to open a grocery store where she can stock her products and sell cereals, vegetables, meats and spices.  This will be her first MFP loan and she commits to be effective with her installment payments.  She will use the 1500 new soles to buy new products for her snack bar.

loans.use: to buy snacks for her snack bar.

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es:
Mario,actualmente solicita un nuevo préstamo, el cual invertira en la compra de más mercadería, para surtir su negocio y comprar más ropa: pantalones, camisas, blusas y de esa forma incrementara sus ganancias porque tendrá más variedad para ofrecerles a sus clientes.
El prestamo anterior lo utilizo para su otra actividad que es la venta de medicinas, por el momento lo invertira este nuevo en la compra de ropa, con la esperanza de tener un exito igual a la inversion anterior.
texts.en: Mario is currently asking for a new loan to buy more merchandise to stock his business and buy more clothes: pants, shirts and blouses to increase profits this way because he’ll have more variety to offer his customers.  He used the previous loan for his other activity which is medicine sales.  For the moment, he’ll invest it in this new one and buy clothes with the hope of having equal success as in the previous investment.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store such as rice, beans, oil, sugar, corn and semolina

loans.name: Francisca Merta

texts.es:
Francisca de 53 años, una mujer trabajadora y honrada que ha sabido como ganarse la vida honradamente.
Su negocio es venta de bebidas como: aguas, colas, etc.

 Es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos ya todos son mayores de edad.
Ella solicita este préstamo para ampliar y mejorar e incrementar su negocio el dinero restante lo quiere para la compra de materiales de construcción.

El sueño de ella es que su casa este terminada ante de que ella fallezca.
texts.en: Francisca, 53, is a hardworking, honest woman who has known how to earn a living honorably.  She sells beverages like water, soft-drinks, etc.  She’s a single mother and has three children who are all now adults.  She asks for the loan to expand, improve and enlarge her business.  She will use any money left over to buy building materials and supplies.  Her dream is to finish building her house before she dies.

loans.use: to buy beverages and bags of ice.

loans.name: Estefania Lilibeth

texts.es:
Estefanía de 21 años, una mujer trabajadora y honrada que ha sabido como ganarse la vida honradamente.
Su negocio es un salón de belleza ubicado en la parte delantera de su vivienda, empezó esta actividad realizando varios cursos.

Es madre soltera, tiene un niño de 5  años de edad, su dificultad es el polvo ya que por donde ella vive  su calle no esta pavimentada, ya que esto le afecta mucho a la clientela.

Ella solicita este préstamo para ampliar y mejorar e incrementar su negocio el dinero restante lo quiere para comprar accesorios para su  negocio    como: tijeras, tinte para el cabello, sillas, etc.

El sueño de ella es que su calle sea pavimentada y que su hijo pueda terminar su carrera escolar.
texts.en: Estefanía, 21, is a hardworking, honest woman who has known how to earn her living honorably.  Her business is a beauty salon located in the front part of her house.  She started this activity taking several courses.  She’s a single mother of a five-year-old son.  Her difficulty is dust because in the area where she lives the street is unpaved and this affects her clientele quite a bit.  She asks for the loan to expand, improve and enlarge the business.  She will use any money left over to buy supplies for the business like scissors, hair color, chairs, etc.  Her dream is that her street is paved and that her son can finish his schooling.

loans.use: to buy furniture, scissors and hair color.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en:
Sandra is the owner of Worldwide Concepts Vacations, a full service travel company specializing in creating unforgettable cultural tour experiences and vacations locally and internationally. She takes pride in the fact that she is able to offer a very personable experience while customizing trips for clients based on their budgets and interests. “Although the travel industry is inundated with online options offering a quick sale, we recognize that clients still see the value of using a reputable travel agency,” explains Sandra. 

Sandra has 32 years of experience in the travel and hospitality industry, and in 1990 decided she wanted to venture out on her own to start Worldwide Concepts Vacations. Originally from the West Indies, Sandra moved to New Orleans in 1986 after meeting and marrying a Times Picayune travel writer. Sandra’s husband of 24 years is heavily involved in the marketing of the business as he helps write and edit all printed materials.  Sandra loves the city and even after evacuating due to hurricane Katrina and living in Kentucky for a year, she was determined to return.  “There is no place like New Orleans; I can only do what I do successfully in New Orleans,” states Sandra.

Sandra will use her Kiva loan to create and print brochures to advertise the company’s newly developed signature tours, which are called Mélange Cultural tours.  These tours entail trips to different historical and cultural locations. Sandra believes these signature tours will result in an influx of  business, enabling her to hire a part-time sales staff to promote the tours to the local hospitality industry.  Additionally, she will use the loan to help lease a 15-25 passenger tour van and to minimize costs for an aspiring tour guide who she will train.

loans.use: to pay for the operation of local city tours

loans.name: Indiana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Indiana, ha mejorado en su economia, al cambiar de trabajo, hoy en dia labora en ventas en un modulo en un mercado capitalino, obteniendo mejores ingresos de pago, ya que anteriormente estaba en servivios domestico.
Tambien sus tres hijos estan laborando, y como objetivo es seguir ampliando su casa, ya que es muy pequeña, con el credito anterior comenzo la construccion de un cuarto, y ahora, hara cambio de techo y poner piso, logrando mejor higiene, y comodidad para su familia. todo este progreso es gracias a los prestamos que Afodenic ha otorgado. Y al esfuerzo del trabajo que junto con mis hijos logramos para una mejor un mejor techo.
texts.en:
Indiana has improved her finances by changing her work.  Nowadays, she sells from a unit in the market of the capital, and earns a better income, since previously she was in domestic service. Her three children are also working.  

Her goal is to continue expanding her home, since it is very small.  With the previous loan she began the construction of a room, and now will have the roof replaced, and a floor put in, achieving better hygiene and comfort for her family. 

All this progress is thanks to the loans that Afodenic has granted, and to the hard work that she along with her children has done. In this way they are managing to build a better roof.

loans.use: To have her roof replaced, and install a floor in the main room, improving its condition.

loans.name: Delia María

texts.es:
La Señora. Delia es socia del banco comunal Ensueños, vive por el centro de la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad es la capital de la provincia de Cañar, es considerada patrimonio arquitectónico y cultural del Ecuador. Su gente es amable, gentil, cálida y mantiene la cultura y tradiciones, cuenta con una amplia gastronomía.

La Señora. Delia tiene 59 años de edad, es viuda y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos, uno de sus hijos es casado  e independiente, sus tres hijos solteros trabajan y  estudian en la universidad. La casa en la que vive es pequeña pero de su propiedad.

Doña Delia labora tiene una tienda de comestibles, lleva 7 años en esta actividad y trabaja de lunes a sábados solo medio día ya que el resto de su tiempo se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar. 

Realiza los créditos en la banca comunal hace 4 años y esto le ha ayudado a crecer en su negocio, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en los estudios de su hijo y en productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda.
 
Su meta es  que sus hijos se incorporen en la universidad y que sean  profesionales.
texts.en:
Delia is a member of the "Ensueños" communal bank, and lives in the central part of the city of Azogues. This city is the capital of Cañar province, and is considered part of the architectural and cultural heritage of Ecuador. Its people are friendly, kind, and warm. They maintain their culture and traditions, and have a varied cuisine.

Delia is 59, a widow, and has four children. One of her children is married and on his own. Her three single children work, and study in university. The house where she lives is small, but it belongs to her.  Delia has a grocery store. She has been in this business for seven years, and works Mondays through Saturdays; only half the day, since the rest of her time is spent doing her household chores. 

She has been undertaking loans at the communal bank for four years, and this has helped her business grow.  She will use her new loan to pay for her son's studies, and to buy basic household products to stock her store. Her goal is to have her children attend university and be professionals.

loans.use: To buy basic household products for her store, and pay for educational expenses.

loans.name: Janneth Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Señora Janneth es socia del banco comunal Ensueños, vive en la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad es la capital de la provincia de Cañar, es considerada  patrimonio arquitectónico y cultural del Ecuador. Su gente es amable, gentil, cálida y mantiene la cultura y tradiciones, cuenta con una amplia gastronomía.

La Señora. Janneth tiene 27 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 5 años de edad que estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es  propiedad de sus padres y como vive con ellos comparte los gastos del hogar.
 
Ella tiene una boutique  hace 7 años, en la cual trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 7  de la noche.

En el banco comunal se encuentra hace un año y medio y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa como: blusas, camisetas, ropa de niños, pantalones, etc. para surtir su local.
 
Su meta es agrandar mucho más su boutique.
texts.en:
Janneth is a member of the "Ensueños" communal bank, and lives in the central part of the city of Azogues. This city is the capital of Cañar province, and is considered part of the architectural and cultural heritage of Ecuador. Its people are friendly, kind, and warm. They maintain their culture and traditions, and have a varied cuisine,

Janneth is 27, divorced, and has a five year-old son who goes to a small school in the city. The house where she lives belongs to her parents, and as she lives with them, she shares the household costs. 
 
She has had a boutique for seven years, where she works Mondays through Saturdays, from 9:00am to 7:00pm.  

She has been in the communal bank for a year and a half, and she will use her new loan to buy clothing such as, blouses, t-shirts, children's clothing, pants etc. to stock her shop. Her goal is to greatly expand her boutique.

loans.use: To buy blouses, t-shirts, children's clothing, pants, etc.

loans.name: Jessica De La Nube

texts.es:
La Señora. Jessica es socia del banco comunal Ensueños, vive por el centro de la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad es la capital de la provincia de Cañar, es considerada patrimonio arquitectónico y cultural del Ecuador. Su gente es amable, gentil, cálida y mantiene la cultura y tradiciones, cuenta con una amplia gastronomía.

La Señora. Jessica tiene 29 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos  de 12 y 4 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en un colegio de la ciudad y su segundo hijo está en la escuela inicial. Su esposo es comerciante, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Doña Jessica labora en una boutique que es propia y lo que más vende es ropa de niños, tiene su negocio 5 años y trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche.
 
En el banco comunal es socia hace 2 años, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa de niños, camisetas, blusas y pantalones para surtir su mercadería.
 
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jessica is a member of the "Ensueños" communal bank, and lives in the central area of the city of Azogues. This city is the capital of Cañar province, and is considered part of the architectural and cultural heritage of Ecuador. Its people are friendly, kind, and warm. They maintain their culture and traditions, and have a varied cuisine.

Jessica is 29, married, and has two children, ages 12 and 4. Her eldest son goes to a secondary school in the city, and her second son is in pre-school.  Her husband is a shopkeeper. They don't have their own house, so they rent. 

Jessica works in her own boutique, and what she mainly sells is children's clothing. She has had the business for five years, and works Mondays through Saturdays, from 9:00am to 7:00pm. She has been in the communal bank for two years. 

She is going to use her new loan to buy children's clothing, t-shirts, blouses, and pants to stock her merchandise. Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: To buy children's clothing, t-shirts, blouses, and pants.

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.es: Bonifacia tiene 50 años, es una mujer alegre y muy trabajadora, convive con su pareja y es madre un hijo ya mayor e independiente. Ella posee una casa propia, ahí comparte sus días con su pareja y su hijo, quien ahora apoya en los gastos del hogar. El trabajo de Bonifacia consiste en la compra de bebidas al por mayor, de ahí lleva a su casa en donde es su lugar de venta y los distribuye por unidad, y gana un porcentaje. Al mismo tiempo aprovecha para ofrecer panecillos y kekes caseros con los que sus clientes comen como aperitivos. Tiene nueve años trabajando en esta actividad y lo hace sola, ya que su pareja se dedica a otras actividades. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo para su hogar. Tiene buenos clientes y le va bien ya que gana buen porcentaje de sus ventas. Espera mas adelante montar una fuente de soda, para que pueda aumentar su economñia. Este será el crédito  úumero 16 con MFP, y espera seguir siendo cumplida con sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más bebidas, entre ellas gaseosas en envase de vidrio y en envases descartable, con esto tendrá mayor cantidad en stock y se evitará estar gastando en pasajes a diarios para hacer sus compras a las distribuidoras.
texts.en:
Bonifacia is 50, and a hard-working, cheerful woman. She lives with her life partner, and is the mother of a son, now an adult and independent. She owns her own house, and there shares her days with her partner and their son, who now contributes to the household expenses. 

Bonifacia's work consists of buying drinks at wholesale. From there, she takes them home, where she sells them by the unit at her store, and earns a percentage. At the same time, she uses the opportunity to sell buns and homemade cakes that her customers eat as snacks. She has been working at this for nine years, and does it on her own, since her partner does other work. 

What she likes about her work is that she has time to look after her home.  She has a good clientele and it is going well, since she earns a good percentage on her sales. Later on, she hopes to set up a soda fountain, so that she can increase her savings.

This will be her 16th loan with MFP, and she expects to continue to be up to date on her payments. With the amount applied for, she will buy more drinks, including soft drinks in glass containers and in disposable containers. In this way she will have more stock, and will avoid having to spend money daily on fares, in order to make her purchases from the distributors.

loans.use: To buy more drinks.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es: Ana mujer trabajadora, comerciante, con el ciclo anterior mejoro el techo del negocio, ahora continuara con su planes a futuro y a corto plazo de mejorar su condiciones de vida, la infraestructura de su negocio y vivienda. Con el préstamo de este ciclo comprara materiales de construcción como: láminas de plycem, cemento, pernos, reglones entre otros materiales para hacer las divisiones de cuarto en su casa, también embaldosar el suelo, siendo de gran necesidad realizarlo. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo brindado para ir cumpliendo sus planes.
texts.en: Ana is a hard-working woman.  She is a saleswoman and used her previous loan to improve the roof of her business.  She will now continue with her future and short-term plans of improving her living conditions, the infrastructure of her business and the infrastructure of her home.  With this loan, she will buy building supplies such as: sheets of Plycem, cement, bolts, screeds and other materials in order to divide her house up into rooms and tile her floor as this work really needs to be done.  She is grateful to the financial institution for the support they have given her in carrying out her plans.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to tile her house.

loans.name: Heydi Patricia

texts.es: Heydi, mujer trabajadora y emprendedora, con el ciclo anterior invirtió en productos para el negocio.  Logrando mantener en constantemente el movimiento de la venta y el ingreso de clientes al auto lavado. Con este préstamo comprara productos como: jabones líquidos, suaviteles, cera de auto, cepillos, también comprara lubricantes de autos, líquidos de frenos, mantillas, ambientadores para autos entre otros productos. Siendo de gran beneficio ya que los clientes podrán realizar sus cambios de aceites, líquidos de frenos para tener mayor seguridad en el camino. Con esta inversión adquirida utilidades que cambiara su nivel de vida. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en: Heydi, a hardworking, enterprising woman, used the previous cycle to buy products for the business managing to sustain constant sales and income from customers of the car wash.  She will use this loan to buy products like: liquid soap, fabric softeners, car wax, brushes.  She will also buy motor oil, brake fluid and odor eliminators, among other products.  This will be of great benefit because customers will be able to do oil changes and replace brake fluid to have greater security on the road.  With this investment she will have higher profits that will change her standard of living.  She thanks the lending institution for the support to her business’ development.

loans.use: to buy auto supplies.

loans.name: Ma Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora Ma Guadalupe es madre de 2 hijos de los cuales quiere ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y confort. Para poder ofrecer a sus hijos lo mejor su esposo y ella trabajan en maquiladora desde hace varios años y para tener un dinero extra se quedan mas horas de la normales. 
La casa donde actualmente vive es de interés social, y esta muy pequeña por dentro, por tal motivo quiere construir un cuarto en la parte de enfrente para extender la sala comedor y de esa manera hacer mas grandes las recamaras. Aunque la construcción ya lleva un avance que con ahorros levanto necesita más capital para terminar. Para Maria es muy importante ofrecer a sus hijos un buen patrimonio y mayor espacio donde ellos puedan tener su propio espacio. Para poder terminar su proyecto necesita comprar material como cemento, arena, varillas y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en:
María Guadalupe is the mother of two children that she wants to provide a better quality of life and comfort for.  To provide the best for her children and her husband she has worked at an assembly plant for several years and to earn extra money she stays overtime.

The house she’s living in at present is a public subsidized one.  It’s very small inside so she wants to add a room to the front to extend the living room/dining room and thus enlarge the bedrooms.  Although the construction project has already started with savings she had, she needs more capital to complete the job.  For María it’s very important to offer her children a good patrimony and more room where they can have their own space.  To be able to finish her project she needs to buy materials like cement, sand and iron rods and to pay labor costs.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Jose Guadalupe

texts.es: Jose Guadalupe es un hombre muy trabajador que decidió hace 2 años instalar su propio negocio donde se podría desarrollar su oficio como técnico en refrigeración, ofreciendo servicio de mantenimiento de Lavadoras, refrigeradores, abanicos, climas secos y hornos de microondas. De esta manera el podría obtener su propio dinero, ser su propio jefe donde el tomara las decisión adecuadas, y tener un mayor ingreso. Para Jose este negocio es parte de su fuente de ingresos por lo que solicita en crédito para comprar partes nuevas y usadas de los artículos que el arregla, para así ofrecer a sus clientes un mejor servicio al tener todo lo necesario; para poder trabajar sin ningún problema de que le falta alguna pieza y tener que conseguirla lo cual le tomaría mas tiempo. A José  le interesa hacer los trabajos con rapidez y calidad, porque es la forma que obtendrá mas clientela.
texts.en: José Guadalupe is a very hardworking man who decided to open his own business two years ago where he could carry out his occupation as a refrigeration technician offering maintenance services for washing machines, refrigerators, fans, air conditioners and microwave ovens.  This way he could earn his own money and be his own boss; he’d make the proper decisions and earn higher income.  For José, this business is part of his source of income so he’s asking for a loan to buy new and used parts for the appliances he repairs to offer his customers better service and to have everything he needs on hand to work problem free and not lack any necessary part and have to go get it wasting time doing so.  José likes to do the jobs quickly and with good quality because that’s how he’ll increase his clientele.

loans.use: to buy new and used parts for refrigerators and washig machines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned food, powderd detergent, soft-drinks and more.

loans.name: Mungunsar

texts.en: Mungunsar is 56 years old and lives with her son, daughter-in-law and grandson in Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. She operates a jewelry trading business in a local market. She started her business when she arrived from Korea in 2010. She has a lack of business experience. For now, her daily profit is 20,000-30,000 MNT. Even though she is fairly new to the business she already has some regular customers and is known for her service. She is a hardworking and diligent woman who says, "I want to increase my current asset in order to improve my profit". She is requesting a 1,500,000 MNT loan to purchase more leather and silver and to increase her assets.

loans.use: To purchase more leather and silver

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
This is 46-year-old Daniel. He is married and has 2 children aged 5 and 2. He has 2 additional dependents who live with him because they are his relatives from the village. In 1998, Daniel established his cooking utensils business. He began his business because he needed a permanent source of income to support his family. He discovered that cooking utensils were a big business opportunity in his community. 

Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,300,000 every month. He would like a loan of Le 5,000,000. Daniel has already received and successfully repaid 2 loans and now requires a new loan to buy more cooking utensils for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000. In the future, Daniel plans to acquire a permanent shop and open his business in other locations and to educate his children to university level. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for cooking utensils

loans.name: Subba

texts.en: This is 42-year-old Subba. He is married and has 2 children aged 8 and 5. In 1996, Subba established his used bags business. He began his business because he wanted a source of income to provide a livelihood for himself and his dependants. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,400,000 every month. He would like a loan of Le 4,500,000. Subba has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan and now requires a new loan to buy more used bags for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Subba plans to do well. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for used bags for his business

loans.name: Santigie

texts.en:
This is 39-year-old Santigie. He is married and has 4 children aged 2, 5, 7 and 9 years. In 2005, Santigie established his fuel (petrol, kerosene and diesel) station and bar business. Santigie started this business on a very small scale, selling fuel in small containers, and latter developed it to a full scale fuel station. Working 7 days a week and 14 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,200,000 every month. 

He would like a loan of Le 4,500,000. Santigie has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan and now requires a new loan to buy drinks: Stout - 10 crates @ Le88,000, Maltina - 10 crates @ Le37,000, Heineken - 10 crates @ Le210,000, soft drinks - 20 crates @ Le30,000, Carlsberg - 7 crates @ Le75,000 and pure drinking water - 10 bundles @ Le2,500. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. 

In the future, Santigie plans to open a mini market and also to open other outlets. He wants to see his children attain better positions in society. By accessing more loans to sustain his business he can achieve his goal. He serves drivers and offices in the city centre and outskirts of town. His business is popular because he is always there to serves his customers. He has two workers: a sales man and a security guard. He gets his supplies from Freetown Kissy Terminal and the drinks along the main streets of Freetown. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy stock of drinks

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
This is 33 year-old Joseph.  He is married, and has 4 children, aged 13, 10, 7 years and 6 months. He has one additional dependent who lives with him because he is his relative and he helps with schooling.  In 2005, Joseph established his bike riding and services business. He began his business as a spare parts dealer and later changed his business to bike riding and services. Joseph gets enough income from this business to provide a livelihood for his family. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,200,000 every month from this business.

He would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Joseph has already received and successfully repaid 2 loans and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional motor bikes. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000. In the future, Joseph plans to raise the number of motor bikes to three.  Also, the loan will help him to pay the fees of his children with ease.   He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for motor bikes

loans.name: Nasreen's Group

texts.en:
Nasreen is married and her husband is a fruit seller. He operates his shop in the market and sells fresh seasonal fruits to his clients. Due to his good quality fruits, people prefer buying from him and he makes reasonably good profits. 

These days, Nasreen’s husband wants money to buy fresh seasonal fruits in larger quantities, which is why Nasreen has applied for a loan from Asasah, a Kiva partner. Her husband has been operating his business for many years and Nasreen is hopeful that an investment will help him get more profits.

She is also a very supportive lady and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. Her earnings help her pay the school fees of her four children and also manage her household expenses. She has another son who is 14 years of age, but he didn’t show interest in studies so he is illiterate and does labor.

loans.use: to buy fresh seasonal fruits.

loans.name: Zubaida's Group

texts.en:
Zubaida is 45 years old.  She has passed the 10th standard in school. Through her education, she got a clerk's post in a company. She serves them by working 8 hours a day. She also owns & operates a sewing business at her home to supplement the income for her family.  Her husband has started a tailoring business. He sews men's clothes in particular and earns reasonably good income.  
Zubaida has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, because she wants to buy a new sewing machine and hire an assistant to expand her sewing business. A new machine will allow her to take more orders and finish them on time to increase her profits. 
She is very expert in her business and very confident that an investment will be beneficial for her.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for sewing business

loans.name: Zuhran's Group

texts.en:
Zuhran is 51 years old and sews clothes for her neighboring clients to support her family financially. She is very supportive in nature and also helps her husband in his animal selling business. She gives his animals food and water and keeps their place clean in a timely way. 
Her husband is involved in two businesses. Professionally he has been a carpenter for the past 16 years but he also has an animal sales business. He has a good name in his community for keeping good animal breeds. 
He helps out people by sharing knowledge about animals and also provides them useful tips on taking care of them.  

With his good knowledge of this profession, he has decided to grow it by buying some animals (goats & sheep) to raise them for selling.
Zuhran is very hopeful that an investment will help her husband grow his business and increase his profits.

loans.use: To buy animals for animal sales business

loans.name: Riaz's Group

texts.en:
Riaz has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband who is a fruit seller. He sells fresh seasonal fruits to his clients at reasonable rates. He is very fair in his dealings with the customers. 
Riaz is a housewife who spends her time staying at home doing her household responsibilities. 
She has given birth to 2 daughters and a son. She couldn’t provide education to her children due to financial constraints. As a result, they remain illiterate. 
Her husband is the only breadwinner in the family and it is very necessary for him to improve his earnings. He has been operating his business for the past many years and Riaz is very confident that an investment will bring positive financial changes to his business and improves her family’s life style. 
Note: “In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Riaz”.

loans.use: To buy fresh seasonal fruits for sale

loans.name: Noor Elahi's Group

texts.en:
Noor elahi is the mother of 7 children, 2 of them are daughter and 5 sons. Due to financial constraints, she couldn’t educate all of her children so only 3 of them are studying. 

Her three sons work as salesmen while her elder daughter sews clothes. 

Noor also works, making Paranday (an ornament used to tie-back hairs) and elastics. These are high demand products and she receives good amount of profits from her business every month. 

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband who prepares bakery items and supplies different bakeries. With the loan, he will buy flour, oil etc to prepare larger quantity of bakery items to be able to increase his sales and profits. 

Noor is very confident about her husband’s business and very much sure that an investment will bring positive financial changes to his business. 
Note: “In the photo, the lady hold a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Noor Elahi”

loans.use: To buy required items for preparing bakery items for sale

loans.name: Shameem's Group

texts.en:
Shameem is a very supportive person and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very skillful and receives regular orders from her customers. 
She is married and her husband sells diesel oil to different dealers and to workshops. He runs a shop in the market and is known among his customers for his good quality oil. He is very experienced in his business and has been operating it for 10 years. 

Shameem is the mother of 6 children: her eldest son is a teacher while the others are studying in different classes. 
Shameem is confident that after the loan investment, her husband's business will grow and he will be able to earn better profits.

loans.use: To buy diesel oil for selling

loans.name: Khvicha

texts.en:
Khvicha is a 39-year-old farmer from the village Vazisubani, Gurjaani District. Khvicha lives with his family: wife Lela, 19-year-old daughter and father. Khvicha’s daughter is a student. 

Khvicha owns a peach garden on family owned 2 hectares of land. He also seasonally grows strawberries on 0.15 hectares and fruit for wine on 0.2 hectares. Khvicha sells all harvested fruit locally. Khvicha owns a tractor. He tills his own land as well as that of neighboring farmers. The family also owns a horse. Khvicha’s father works as night watchman in a local store. The total average income of the family is 660 Laris (approximately 400 USD) per month.

Khvicha requested credit to finance 3 activities. He will purchase an additional 0.7 hectares of agricultural land. He will use it productively and increase the amount of fruit sold. He will also use the credit to purchase chemicals to treat the peach trees for parasites. That is the prerequisite of a good peach harvest next summer. With the third part of the credit Khvicha will renovate part of the family house. After using the credit for the above mentioned purposes, the income of the family will increase and they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase land and chemicals for treating peach-trees for parasites

loans.name: Zoya

texts.en:
Zoya is from the village of Akhasheni, Gurjaani District. This district is well-known throughout the country for wine-making. Zoya is 60 years old, married and lives with her husband Dimitri. Both family members are retired. 

Zoya and Dimitri purchase grapes and make vodka. Vodka is sold locally in the village. They have 8 years experience in this business. Zoya requested credit to purchase grapes. Zoya and Dimitri will produce vodka and sell it in the winter months. The total average income of the family is 700 Laris (420 USD) per month including their pensions. After making the vodka the family will get income, which will be used to finance their daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase grapes for vodka production

loans.name: Giulumnaz

texts.en:
Giulumnaz is 40 years old. She is from the village of Karajalari, Gardabani District. Giulumnaz lives with her 70-year-old mother. 

Giulumnaz and her mother earn a living through the family agricultural business. In particular, they have 1000 sq meters of land where greens are grown. Giulumanz sells harvested greens in Tbilisi (the capital city). She also sells various vegetables which are purchased from neighborhood farms. The family also has a small livestock farm. Giulumnaz purchases calves in the fall, raises them and sells them in spring for a higher price. 

Giulumnaz requested credit to purchase calves. She will sell grown calves in spring for a higher price and get additional income. It will impact positively on family living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Sadaan's Group

texts.en:
Sadaan has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the betterment of her son’s milk and yogurt selling business. He operates his shop in the market from where he provides fresh, quality milk and yogurt to his customers. He has contacts with different milk sellers who provide milk to him early in the morning on daily basis. He prepares yogurt from it and sells it at a profit to his customers. 
He is new in this business: he started it only a year ago. Sadaan is hopeful that an investment will help her son establish his business and increase his profits. 
Sadaan herself is a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very skillful and receives regular orders every month. Besides her work, she also performs her household duties very well. 

Sadaan is a new loan user of Asasah and this is her first loan application to Asasah.

loans.use: To buy milk for her son's youghurt and milk selling business

loans.name: Janat

texts.en:
Janat is from the village of Kharataklia, Gardabani district, East Georgia. Janat is 55 years old, married and lives with her family: husband – Muradkhan, 28 year-old-son, daughter-in-law and 2 grandsons (2 and 3 years old). 

Janat and Muradkhan are the income providers in the family. They run a family agricultural business. They have 2 milk cows, 8 calves and 25 sheep. Janat produces cheese and sells it locally. Domestic animals (lambs, calves) are also sold locally. Her son is temporarily unemployed; her daughter-in-law is a housewife.

Janat requested credit to purchase feed for domestic animals for the winter months. She will feed them well during the winter months and will get good quality dairy products. Also, in spring she will sell lambs and some of the calves. After selling dairy products and domestic animals for a good price the family will make a profit which will be used for the family well-being. Janat will also reinvest part of the profit in the family farm to expand it.

loans.use: to purchase feed for domestic animals

loans.name: Makhbila

texts.en:
Makhbila is 60 years old. She lives in the village of Jandara, Gardabani District, East Georgia. Makhbila is married and lives with her husband, Alikhan. 

Makhbila and Alikhan earn a living through agricultural activities. In particular, they have 5 milk cows and 7 calves. Makhbila sells milk in the village. The total average income of the family is 1200 Laris. 

Makhbila’s village is getting gas connected. Makhbila also wants to be included in the process but she can’t as her house isn’t registered as her property in the country’s relevant registry. With the requested credit, Makhbila plans to pay all official fees for registering the house and afterwards she will get access to gas. It will significantly improve the living conditions of herself and Alikhan.

loans.use: to pay official fees for property registration in order to get access to natural gas

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru:
Светлана начала свой бизнес по продаже одежды 15 лет назад. Благодаря своему трудолюбию и настойчивости, а также заинтересованности в работе с данной группой товаров, она смогла сделать свой бизнес стабильным и успешным. На данный момент Светлана работает на местном Рижском рынке в городе Мелитополе, где она проживает вместе со своей семьей. Ее оборотный капитал составляет 40 000 гривен. 

Светлане необходим кредит в размере 12 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить женскую одежду к осеннему сезону. Светлана надеется увеличить ассортимент продаваемого товара и продажи, а, значит, получить дополнительную прибыль. За счет получения дополнительной прибыли клиент будет улучшать благосостояние своей семьи. 

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Svetlana started her business selling clothing fifteen years ago. Svetalna is hardworking and persistent as well as very interested in working with the given niche of merchandise and thanks to that she was able to create a stable and successful business. At this time Svetlana works on the local market called Rijskiy in the town of Melitopol where she lives with her family. Her working capital is 40,000 hrivna.

Svetlana needs a loan in the amount of 12,000 hrivna to buy women's clothing for the autumn season. Svetlana hopes to increase the variety of her merchandise and also sales as well as get additional profit. By getting that profit she will improve the well being of her family.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothing for the autumn season

loans.name: Elena

texts.ru:
Елена – из Мелитополя. Она живет здесь со своим мужем и 10-летним сыном. Елена – владелица двух киосков, которые располагаются в двух местных школах. В них Елена продает школьные принадлежности и канцтовары. У Елены школьники всегда могут найти то, что им нужно, у нее представлен хороший ассортимент по приемлемым ценам. В этом бизнесе она работает уже 7 лет. На данный момент у нее в товаре находится примерно 50 000 гривен. 

Елена планирует использовать кредит КИВА в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы пополнить товарные запасы и получить дополнительную прибыль. Как и все увлеченные предприниматели, Елене нравится вкладывать свои силы и время в свое дело и развивать его. Она планирует и в дальнейшем стремиться к процветанию и стабильности своего бизнеса, что, в свою очередь, поможет ей улучшать и свой быт. 
Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Elena is from Melitopol. She lives here with her husband and ten year old son. Elena is an owner of two kiosks which are located inside two local schools. Elena sells school supplies and stationery at these schools. The students can always find what they need and she has a good variety of products at reasonable prices. She has been in this business for seven years. At this time she has about 50,000 hrivna invested in her merchandise.

Elena plans to use the Kiva loan for 10,000 hrivna to restock her inventory supplies and get an additional profit. As other enthusiastic entrepreneurs Elena likes to invest her energy and time in her business and develop it. She plans to aim towards growth and stability of her business in the future which will also help her improve her livelihood.

loans.use: to restock her inventory supply and get additional profit

loans.name: Nadezhda

texts.ru:
Надежда живет со своей семьей в городе Запорожье, на юго-востоке Украины. Она занимается розничной торговлей женской одеждой: продает женские домашние костюмы, трикотаж, халаты, а также мужскую обувь местного производства. Начинала Надежда с работы реализатора в обувном магазине. Сейчас у нее свое торговое место и свое дело. Точка Надежды располагается на крытом рынке, прямо при входе на рынок. Надежда работает в этом бизнесе уже 16 лет. На данный момент в товар у нее вложено около 60 000 гривен. 

Надежде необходим кредит в 12 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить  сезонную обувь производства местной обувной фабрики «Мида». Упорство, желание работать и достигать результатов всегда помогали Надежде двигаться вперед и достигать поставленных целей и она надеется и дальше развиваться и вкладывать в свое дело, достигая стабильности и процветания. Более того, она надеется использовать полученные от бизнеса средства, чтобы помочь своему единственному сыну встать на ноги.   
Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Nadezhda lives with her family in the town of Zaporozhye in the south-east of Ukraine. She does retail sales of women's clothing: she sells clothing for the home, knitwear, robes and also mens shoes produced locally. Nadezhda started out as a salesperson in a shoe store. Right now she has her own vendor location and her own business. Nadezhda's space is located on the open market near the entrance. She has been in this business for sixteen years. At this time she has around 60,000 hrivna invested in her inventory.

Nadezhda needs a loan in the amount of 12,000 hrivna to buy seasonal shoes made by a local factory maker Mida.
