Persistence, willingness to work and to achieve results always helped Nadezhda to move forward and reach her goals, and she hopes to further develop and invest into her business achieving stability and growth. Moreover, she hopes to use the profit from the business to help her only son get on his feet.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal shoes made by a local factory Mida

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes tiene 60 años de edad, y vive con dos nietos.

Mercedes se ha dedicado al comercio desde hace más de 20 años, y lo ha hecho sola con sus hijos desde hace 11 años. Ella aprendió a manejar bien el negocio gracias a la orientación de su esposo, debido a que el comercializaba con ganado y empezó llevándole a la señora una bolsa de bocadillos, una arroba de azúcar y así poco a poco fue prosperando su negocio hasta que llego hacer fuerte.

Mercedes tiene que trasladarse a la ciudad para realizar sus compras, ella aborda un autobús que la lleve y el viaje dura alrededor de tres horas. El retorno a su casa lo hace en una mototaxi (una motocicleta que presta servicio de taxi. Cuando Mercedes hace compras más grandes, ella viaja a una ciudad más lejana y demora unas siete horas para realizar sus compras y regresar a su casa. En estas ocaciones ella aprovecha el viaje de un camión que sale una vez por semana en donde viajan todos los comerciantes de su comunidad.

Ella solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo para mejorar su tienda. Anteriormente Mercedes dio crédito a sus clientes, lo cual es común en su comunidad, y éstos demoraron en pagarle disminuyendo la capacidad de adquisición de Mercedes. Con el préstamo ella aprovechara para comprar más productos y asi satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes. De esta forma ella mejorará sus ingresos.

En un futuro Mercedes pretende seguir mejorando su negocio para tener siempre lo necesario para sobrevivir y no depender de otros. Además, Mercedes quiere dejar un legado a sus hijos y nietos de cómo saber ganarse la vida honradamente.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 60 years old and lives with two grandchildren.  She’s been a merchant for over 20 years and has worked just with her children for the last 11 years.  She learned how to run the business well thanks to training from her husband.  Because he was a cattle merchant he started bringing her a bag of snacks or an arroba of sugar and gradually she started to make progress until her business became strong.

Mercedes has to travel to the city to make her purchases.  She boards a bus that takes her on a trip that takes three hours.  She returns home in a mototaxi (a motorcycle that provides taxi services).  When Mercedes makes larger purchases she travels to a more distant city and takes seven hours to do her shopping and return home.  On these occasions she avails herself of a truck that leaves once a week and transports all the merchants from her community.

She requests a loan from Fundación Campo to improve her store.  Mercedes previously sold on credit to her customers, a common practice in her community, but they delayed paying her which decreased Mercedes’ buying capacity.    The loan will make it possible for her to buy larger amounts of merchandise to meet customer demand thus improving her income.

In the future, Mercedes intends to continue improving her business to always have what’s necessary to survive and not be dependent on others.  Besides, Mercedes wants to leave a legacy for her children and grandchildren: that they know how to earn their livelihood honestly.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es:
La señora Rosa tiene 53 años D. edad, vive con su compañero D. vida y dos D. sus cuatro hijos.

Ella tiene 26 años D. vender en el mercado toda clase D. mercadería: ropa, verduras, D. todo a lo que ella pueda obtener una ganancia. La señora Rosa compra la mercadera al por mayor a las 5:30 D. la mañana en el mercado y luego ella lo sale a vender D. forma ambulante en canastos al mercado todo el día al menudeo.

La señora solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar un puesto en el mercado, para ya no verse en la necesidad D. andar ambulante y que sus clientes puedan tener un lugar donD. buscarla. Esto le ayudara en gran medida a obtener mejores ganancias, lo cual le servirá para dar una mejor alimentación y nivel D. vida a su familia, además ella esta apoyando a su hija que estudia enfermería y su sueño es que ella termine su estudio y poder ampliar su negocio y tener mas mercaderia.
texts.en:
Rosa is 53 years old and lives with her life partner and two of her four children.  

She has been selling all types of merchandise at the market for 26 years. She sells clothing, vegetables, and anything else that she can sell for profit. Rosa buys her merchandise at 5:30 in the morning at the market at wholesale prices and she later walks through the markets with baskets selling it at retail.

She is asking for a loan from Fundación Campo in order to buy a stall in the market. Then she will no longer have to walk about with her merchandise and her customers will know where to find her. This will help her a great deal in that she will earn higher income, which will help her give better food to her family and improve their standard of life. Furthermore, she is supporting her daughter who is studying to be a nurse and her dream is that she finishes her studies and also that she can expand her business and carry more merchandise.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as clothing, vegetables and other items

loans.name: Silvia  Alicia

texts.es: La Sra. Silvia y su apreciable esposo tienen una tienda de abarrotes la  cual  abren  todos  los  día  desde  muy  temprana  hora , este  negocio  les  a  permitido  salir  adelante  día  con día,  el  proyecto  que  requieren  realizar  es la  compra  de mercancía  para  tener  disponible al instante los   productos  que   venden    ya  que se  preocupan por  brindarle  a sus  clientes  el excelente  servicio  que   los  a  caracterizado.
texts.en:
Señora Silvia and her respectable husband have a grocery store, which is open every day from an early hour. This business has allowed them to move ahead in life on a daily basis.

The project they want to work on is buying merchandise so that they have their products available right away, and they can focus on providing their customers with the excellent service that they are known for.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Elidia

texts.es: La apreciable Sra. Elidia cuenta con un club de nutrición , donde sirve desayunos por las mañanas además   tiene  un puesto de comida  mexicana el  cual  abre únicamente los fines de semana,  gracias a  estos  ingresos   puede  sacar  adelante a  su  familia, en esta  ocasión ella  requiere  realizar  la  compra  de mercancía  para  continuar  operando sus  negocios, ve  en  el  crédito  la  posibilidad  de   hacer   crecer  su negocio  obteniendo mayores  ingresos,  es por  ello  que  agrace   el  apoyo  brindado para  la realización de su proyecto.
texts.en:
The respectable Señora Elidia has a nutrition club, where she serves breakfast in the mornings.  She also has a stall selling Mexican food, which is only open on the weekends.  Thanks to her income from these businesses, she is able to move her family ahead in life.

On this occasion, she wants to buy merchandise to continue operating her businesses.  In the loan, she sees the possibility of growing her business by earning greater income. For this reason, she is grateful for the help being provided for her to realize her plan.

loans.use: to buy food supplies and natural products for her food stall.

loans.name: José Andres

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 25 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo.

Él trabaja en la agricultura desde hace ocho años, por lo que tiene mucha experiencia en sembrar maíz, fríjol y en la crianza de vacas.  Todos sus cultivos los maneja él solo y nunca ha tenido problemas de perdida.

Se levanta todos los días a las 4:30 de la mañana para alimentar a sus animales y luego los lleva a pastorear a un cerro caminando una hora y media para llegar donde tiene sus cultivos. Para aprovechar su viaje al cultivo el cliente necesita tener vacas, así en lo que él trabaja en el cultivo los animales podrán alimentarse y obtener buena producción de leche, de esta manera mejorara la producción de leche, lo cual le permitirá mejorar la canasta básica de su hogar.

Don José adquiere sus insumos en una ciudad del oriente del país, por lo que debe viajar durante una hora, además debe pagar por el trasporte, pero él se siente muy satisfecho de lo que hace.

Él solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar una vaca la cual le dará leche y queso, de esta forma alimentara a su familia, ahorrándose la compra de estos en otra parte y puede obtener un mejor ingreso.

Don José desea tener varias vacas, cultivar más maíz y poder construir su casa de ladrillo, por que la que tiene es de bloque y darle la oportunidad a su hijo de tener un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
José is 25 years old. He lives with his life partner and their son.

He's been a farmer for eight years and has a lot of experience growing beans and corn and raising cows. He tends all his crops on his own and has always had good success.

He gets up at 4:30 in the morning every day to feed his animals and then walks them to pasture on a hill about an hour and a half away, where his crops are. To take advantage of the trip, he needs cows, so that he'll be able to feed the animals what he grows and they'll produce a lot of milk. That way he will produce more milk, which will improve his family's economic situation.

Don José gets his supplies in a city in the eastern part of the country. It takes him an hour to get there and he has to pay for the bus ticket, but he's very happy with his work.

He's requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to buy a cow so he can produce milk and cheese to feed his family. That way he can save money and earn a better income.

Don José would like to have several cows, grow more corn, and be able to build a brick house--the one he has now is made of cinder blocks--so he can offer his son the opportunity to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Lesbia De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Doña Lesbia sigue administrando su comedor, el cual lleva años con las ventas, sus hijos siguen creciendo y estudiando. Su esposo sigue laborando como electricista y siempre apoya a su familia.
Para ambos el proposito ha sido, la construccion de su casa, en donde lo han logrado, con ahorros propios y financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado, con el credito anterior, puso techo y ventana no de buena de calidad por que ya no alcanzo el dinero, es por eso con este nuevo financiamiento podra comprar puerta y ventana y las verjas, teniendo mejor calidad y seguridad en su casa.
texts.en:
Lesbia continues to administer her restaurant that has taken years to build up sales. Her sons continue growing and studying. Her husband continues working as an electrician and always supports the family.

For both of them the goal has been the building of their house, and they have succeeded with their own savings and with the loans that Afodenic has given previously, in order to put in windows and roofing of good quality.

Now they can not afford to buy doors, windows and fences which is why they are asking for this loan, in order to have better living arrangements and more security in their home.

loans.use: to buy doors, windows and security grating for the windows to upgrade living conditions and security

loans.name: Santos Manuela

texts.es:
La señora Santos Manuela es casada, tiene 32 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijo el cual estudia, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa típicas, inició su negocio como trabajadora para otro negocio y al momento lleva 6 años de experiencia.

solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo para capital y comprar mas mercadería consistente en ropa típica: cortes y güipiles, espera en el futuro ver su negocio grande.
texts.en:
Santos Manuela is married, 32 years old, and attended 6 years of primary school. She has 1 son who studies and she is in the business of selling typical Guatemalan clothing. She began her business by working for someone else but now has 6 years of experience.

She is asking for a loan to have capital so she can buy more merchandise of the more typically worn clothing of cortes (skirts, which are usually rectangular pieces of flat fabric that can be used for other purposes too) and güipiles (hand woven blouses). Her dream is to see her business expand.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for resale

loans.name: Edgar Rene

texts.es:
El señor Edgar Rene es soltero, tiene 25 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de bachiller, se dedica actualmente a la carpintería, inició  siendo trabajador y lleva 4 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para usarlos para capital de trabajo y producirá mas muebles, ya que esta vez va a compra madera, y mejorar así sus ganancias. Espera mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
25-year old Señor Edgar Rene is single. He graduated from high school and is now a carpenter. He started out as a assistant and has four years of experience.

Edgar is seeking a loan to invest in his business so he can produce more furniture and earn more money. He plans to buy wood with the money. He is hoping to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Rudismao

texts.es:
El señor Rudismao tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos.

Él se ha dedicado a la agricultura, pero hace seis años ha estado prestando sus servicios transportando materiales para la construcción en su propio vehiculo. Adquiere los materiales que necesita en una ciudad del oriente del país y luego los distribuye con forme se los han solicitado.

El señor Rudismao esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para darle mantenimiento a su vehiculo, y de esta forma poder darle un buen funcionamiento y no perder viajes lo cual significaría menos ingresos. Al tener en buen estado su vehiculo las ganancias permanecerán estables y les dará mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Él desea comprar un camión en mejores condiciones y poder tener su propia empresa y brindarles el estudio a sus hijos, para que sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
32 year old Señor Rudismao lives with his wife and two children. He used to work in agriculture, but six years ago he started offering his services transporting construction material in his own vehicle. He collects the items from a city in the eastern part of the country and then delivers them to the people who have ordered them.

Rudismao is seeking a loan from Fundación Campo to service his vehicle and keep it well-maintained so that he doesn’t miss out on any business and lose income. If he keeps his vehicle in good condition, his income will be stable and he will be able to provide a better quality of life for his family.

In the future he wishes to buy a truck in better condition, have his own business, and provide his children with a good education so that they can do well in life.

loans.use: to keep his vehicle in good condition

loans.name: Miguel Carlos

texts.es:
El señor Miguel Carlos es casado, tiene 21 años de edad, cursó los 4 años de educación primaria, aun no tiene hijos, se dedica a la fabricación de zapatos, inició este trabajo como empleados para otro negocio y ahora con su propio negocio lleva 2 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo para la compra de una maquina pegadora ya que de esa forma mejorará su productividad y por lo que puede mejorar sus ganancia, espera en el futuro tener un negocio grande.
texts.en:
21-year old Señor Miguel Carlos has four years of primary education. He doesn’t have any children yet. He earns his living making shoes. He started out as an assistant in another business and now has had his own shoe-making business for two years.

Miguel is seeking a loan to buy a sewing machine so he can improve productivity. This will lead in turn to more earnings. In the future he hopes to have a large business.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Sergio Arturo

texts.es:
El señor Sergio Arturo es casado, tiene 28 años de edad, cursó solo los estudió de pre-primaria, no tiene hijos, se dedica a la agricultura y al comercio a la venta de ropas de toda clase para todas las edades, tiene 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un crédito para ampliar su capital de trabajo para compra de mercadería, lencería, chumpas, sudaderos, playeras, pants, etc. Espera ver su negocios grande.
texts.en:
Señor Sergio Arturo is 28 years old and married.  He only has a pre-primary education [ages 4-6].  He doesn't have any children.   He works in agriculture as well as selling clothing for all ages for a living.  He has 5 years of experience.

He is requesting a loan to increase his working capital.  He will buy merchandise such as lingerie, jackets, sweat shirts, shirts, pants, etc.  He hopes to see his business grow.

loans.use: purchase merchandise such as  lingerie, jackets, sweat shirts, shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
La señora Flor tiene 29 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y dos hijos.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de vacas desde hace diez años, anteriormente ella estudiaba, pero hoy en día se dedica al cuido de sus animales. Además de cuidar sus animales ella realiza cultivos y los insumos los compra en una ciudad del oriente del país, por lo que debe viajar durante una hora. Se levanta todos los días a las 6:00 a.m. para alimentar a sus animales luego las lleva a pastorear a su potrero y a las 12:00 p.m. regresa a su casa.

La señora Flor solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar más vacas y tener mayores ganancias, ya que la producción de leche será mayor, lo que le permitirá mejorar su condición de vida. Ella espera tener una ganadería muy productiva para comercializar queso y darles el estudio a sus hijos, para que sean unos profesionales.
texts.en:
Señora Flor is 29 years old and lives with her life partner and two children.  

She has been raising cows for 10 years.  She used to study, but now she is dedicated to caring for her animals.  In addition to caring for her animals, she grows crops.  She purchases her supplies in a city in the western part of the country and, because of this, she has to travel an hour.  She gets up every morning at 6:00 am to feed her animals and then she puts them out to graze in the pasture.  At noon she returns home.  

Señora Flor is requesting a loan through Fundación Campo to buy more cows and to increase her income since her milk production will increase.  This will allow her to improve her standard of living.  She hopes to have a very productive herd so she can sell cheese and give her children an education so they can become professionals.

loans.use: purchase more cows.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Doña Estela hoy en dia, esta laborando como cocinera, obteniendo un salario fijo, decision que tomo, ya que parte de sus ventas de ropa y cosmeticos, sus clientes no le estaban pagando.
Es por tal razon busca empleo. Su hija sigue estudiando y su esposo laborando para el bienestar familiar.
Atravez de los financiamientos ha logrado hacer mejora a su casa, que junto a su esposo, se esfuerzan para tener una casa en mejores condiciones.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo, seguira dando mejora al cuarto que comenzo hacer anteriormente, en darle repello, embaldozar, puertas y ventana. Y poder terminarlo, para el alquiler. Ya que como planes es poder obtener ingresos que solventen sus gastos personales y estudio de su hija,
texts.en:
Estela is currently working as a cook and getting a fixed salary.  She made this decision because her customers were not paying for part of her clothing and cosmetic sales.  That is why she looks for employment.

Her daughter is continuing with her education, and her husband is working for the family’s well-being.

Through the loans she has managed to improve her house.  She and her husband put forth effort together in order to have a house in better conditions.  

Now, with this new loan she will continue improving the room that she started on previously.  She will plaster and tile the room and install doors and a window.  Then she will be able to finish it in order to rent it.  

Her plans are now to be able to get income for their personal expenses and her daughter’s education.

loans.use: to improve a room with plaster and tile.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to replace the interior walls of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase two cattle and fodder

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Juan tiene 64 años de edad, vive con su esposa y dos de sus cinco hijos.

Él tiene 54 años de dedicarse a la agricultura desde muy pequeño sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar en la agricultura. Él viaja a una ciudad de la zona oriental del país, en autobús durante treinta cinco minutos, para comprar sus insumos.

Don Juan esta solicitando un préstamo, para comprar una parcela de tierra que esta alquilando y es donde él trabaja, ya que actualmente la están vendiendo y él la quiere adquirir por que si la venden a otra persona, él se quedara sin un lugar donde trabajar.

De esta manera don Juan, ya no tendrá que alquilar y preocuparse de que debe pagar y podrá continuar sembrando granos básicos como maíz y mantener a su ganado ahí mismo.

El desea continuar trabajando, tener más animales para obtener mejores ingresos y proveer a su familia de una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Juan is 64 years old living with his wife and two of his five children.  He’s been farming for 54 years.  His parents taught him how to work in agriculture when he was very little.  He takes a 35-minute bus trip to a city in the east of the country to buy his supplies.

Juan is asking for a loan to buy a piece of land that he currently farms and leases since it’s for sale right now and he wants to buy it because if they sell it to someone else he’ll be left with no place to work.  In this way, Juan won’t have to lease any longer nor worry about having to pay and will be able to continue farming basic grains like corn and to keep his cattle there.  He wants to keep working and to have more animals to earn better income to provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase three cattle, one cow and fodder

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock to increase income

loans.name: Sandra Johana

texts.es:
Doña Sandra esta contenta por que pronto se podra pasar  a su casa nueva de concreto, ella sigue con su negocio de venta de fritanga, nacatamales, asi como, ahora cuida a dos niño en medio tiempo lo que le genera mejores entradas economicas.
Ahora con los prestamo que Afodenic ha dado en dos ciclos lleva mas rapido el proceso de  la construccion, con el credito anterior logro terminar paredes de enfrente, ya que tenia terminado todo el cajon, el cual junto a su esposo con ahorros habian comenzado la construccion.
Con este nuevo prestamo pondra todo el techo en donde comprara perlines, laminas de zinc, golosos, soldadura, ya que solo el techo y las puerta hace falta. Y que pronto espera estar gozando con su familia de una mejor vivienda.
texts.en:
Sandra is happy because she’s going to be able to move into her new concrete house soon.  She’s still working selling fried fast food snacks and nacatamales but has started to care for children half days which is an extra source of income.

With the loans that Afodenic has provided in the last two cycles she’s been able to do the house construction faster.  With the previous loan she managed to finish building the front walls since she’d finished the entire framework which her husband had started to build with savings they had.

With this new loan she’ll be able to install the roof.  She will buy purlins, metal sheeting, screws and solder since all they have left to do is install the roof and door.  She hopes to soon be enjoying a better dwelling with her family.

loans.use: to roof her house.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en: Rana is a 58-year-old lady. She is married with four children. Rana has been running her own small business for 20 years. She has a trading place at the market for selling clothes and home products. She is very friendly and polite which allows her to have the clientele she has. Now she is requesting a loan of 800 AZN. Rana is planning to use the loan to purchase more goods to sell thus increasing her product range.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for the new season

loans.name: José Rufino

texts.es:
José es un comerciante informal de artesanías de 30 años de edad quien vive con su mamá y dos hermanas.

 Él tiene diez años de trabajar en las ferias, él se desplaza de pueblo en pueblo en las fecha festivas para vender los productos artesanales que compra por mayoreo y algunos los elabora personalmente, este oficio lo aprendió de unos amigos y luego decidió establecer su propio negocio. Él es originario de Morazán, no obstante por su negocio el recorre toda la zona oriental del país y ya tiene dos locales donde vende sus artesanías. 

José es una persona muy alegre y trabajadora. El señor se levanta todas la mañanas a instalar su venta a razón de que las personas que visitan las ferias puedan apreciar sus productos y adquirirlos a precios accesibles. Para él es un poco difícil estar separado tantos días de su familia pero también reconoce que la vida esta difícil y es necesario hacer sacrificios para tener un mejor porvenir.

El cliente solicita un crédito en Fundación Campo, por que actualmente tiene un inventario pequeño y quiere aumentarlo por que ya se avecinan las festividades de fin de año, periodo en el que las ventas se incrementan por ser varios pueblos los que celebran sus fiestas patronales. José tiene el plan de comprar productos por mayoreo y con ello obtener un buen porcentaje de ganancias y ayudar a su mamá con los gastos del hogar.  A futuro José quiere tener varios puestos de artesanías y a medida aumenten sus ingresos, él tiene planeado mejorar su casa y estar pendiente de cualquier necesidad que se presente en su familia.
texts.en:
José is an informal crafts merchant.  He’s 30 years old and lives with his mother and sisters.  He’s been working at the markets for ten years.  He goes from town to town during festive occasions to sell the crafts he buys at wholesale and some that he makes himself.  He learned this occupation from some friends and then decided to set up his own business.  He is from Morazán but due to his work he travels throughout the eastern part of the country and already has two locales where he sells his crafts.

José is a very cheerful, hardworking person.  He rises every morning to set up his stand so that people visiting the market can admire his products and buy them at affordable prices.  For him, it’s a bit difficult to be separated from his family for so many days but he recognizes that life is difficult and sacrifices have to be made to have a better future.

The client has asked Fundación Campo for a loan because his stock inventory is currently small and he wants to increase it because the end of year festivities are approaching and this is a time when sales increase because several towns celebrate their patron saints days.  José plans to buy products at wholesale so that he can earn a good profit percentage and help his mother with household expenses.  In the future, José would like to have several crafts stands and as his income improves he plans to make home improvements and to be able to take care of any need his family might have.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to increase his stock inventory.

loans.name: Buena Vista San Bartolo Group

texts.es:
El señor Carlos Eduardo es soltero, tiene 22 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, se dedica al comercio, a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y para diferente edades, inició este trabajo con sus padres y hasta ahora lleva 3 años con su propio negocio. 

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo para utilizarlo para capital de trabajo para la compra de mercadería: lencería, chupas, suéteres, playeras, camisas; para su posterior reventa, espera en el futuro tener un capital grande. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio.
texts.en:
Carlos Eduardo, 22, is single.  He completed third grade.  He’s a merchant selling all types of clothes for all ages.  He started this work with his parents and now has had his own business for three years. 

He organized a group to request a loan to use as working capital to buy merchandise: lingerie, jackets, sweaters, t-shirts, shirts to resell later.  He hopes in future to have large capital.  The other group members are merchants.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Carlos Alfonso

texts.es:
El señor Carlos Alfonso es soltero, tiene 45 años de edad, estudios sus estudios primarios, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa de toda clase, inició este trabajo siendo operario para otra negocio y lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo como capital de trabajo para compra mercadería consistente en suéteres, chumpas, lencería, sudaderos, camisas, playeras y entre otros. En el futuro espera ver su negocio grande.
texts.en:
Carlos Alfonso is single and 45 years old. He studied through primary school and sells all types of clothing. He began this work while having another business and has 10 years of experience.

He is asking for a loan in order to have capital to buy merchandise of sweaters, sport jackets, lingerie, sweatshirts, shirts, t-shirts and other items. In the future he hopes to see his store expand.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell

loans.name: Ofelia Viviana

texts.es:
La señora Ofelia Viviana es casada, tiene 43 años D. edad, curso los estudios D. educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos D. los cuales 2 estudian, se dedica a la tejeduría D. toda clase D. telas típicas, cuenta con 15 años D. experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica al mismo oficio.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo para capital D. trabajo para la compra D. hilos D. varias clases y colores para producir mas: cortes típicos, sabanas y servilletas. espera en el futuro ver un negocio amplio.
texts.en: Ofelia Viviana, 43, is married.  She completed elementary school and has five children two of which are going to school.  She weaves all sorts of traditional textiles.  She has 15years’ experience and her husband, who is in the same occupation, supports her efforts.  She’s asking for a loan to use as working capital to buy yarn in assorted colors and types to make more traditional fabrics, sheets and napkins.  She hopes in future to see a large business.

loans.use: to buy yarn.

loans.name: Yila Waleska

texts.es: Yila de 37 años de edad es soltera, tiene 3 hijos, el mayor de 21, el segundo de 18 y el menor de 9 añitos.  Tiene 15 años de tener su propio negocio de comideria ubicado en Santo Domingo, donde atiende clientela variada.  Esta solicitando su 10mo credito con el objetivo de ampliar su casa para el negocio de comedor que tiene, ya que actualmente tiene mas demanda y quiere brindarles una mejor comodidad para que se sientan mejor atendidos, ademas desea comprar productos para el negocio como viveres y otras cositas que necesita en su dispensa.
texts.en: Yila, 37, is single.  She has three children.  The oldest is 21, the second one is 18 and the youngest is 9 years old.  She’s had her own eatery in Santo Domingo for the last 15 years where she tends to a varied clientele.  She’s asking for her 10th loan to enlarge her house for the eatery business she has because she currently has more demand and she wants to provide comfort so that they will feel better taken care of.  In addition, she wants to buy products for the business like foodstuffs and some other things she needs for her pantry.

loans.use: to enlarge her business.

loans.name: Martha Jeaneth

texts.es: Martha de 42 años de edad es casada, tiene 4 hijos de 16, 14, 12 y 10 años de edad.  Trabaja como comerciante en Santo Domingo.  Esta solicitando su 1er credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda construyendo una pared que se encuentra en mal estado, pues teme que en cualquier momento ocurra un accidente.  Ya tiene parte de los materiales, pero necesita comprar el cemento y el pago del albañil que le hara el trabajo.  Espera poder contar con el apoyo de la institucion para poder llevar su proyecto a cabo.
texts.en: Martha, 42, is married and has four children who are 16, 14, 12 and 10 years of age.  She works as a merchant in Santo Domingo.  She’s asking for her first home improvement loan to erect a wall that’s in poor shape because she fears that an accident could happen at any moment.  She already has part of the materials but needs to buy cement and pay the bricklayer who will do the work.  She hopes to get support from the institution to be able to carry out her project.

loans.use: to erect a wall.

loans.name: Elvia

texts.es:
La señorita Elvia desea iniciar un negocio de elaboración y venta de comida Mexicana en su propia casa y tener las entrega en diferentes partes de la ciudad. 
Solicita el préstamo para invertir en comprar de los productos y mercancía que es (platos especiales para la entrega, cubiertos de plástico y comprar suficiente a alimentos para la preparación de los platillos que serian chiles rellenos, tamales, enchiladas, guisados) por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para invertir en el negocio. 
Planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo en una compañía de trasportes cono auxiliar administrativo. 
Desea empezar este nuevo negocio y así ayudar a una amiga con darle trabajo y las dos salir adelante y ayudarse en la economía familiar.
texts.en: Elvia wants to start a business making and selling Mexican food at home for delivery to various parts of the city.  She’s asking for the loan to buy the ingredients and merchandise (special dishes for delivery, plastic cutlery and enough food to prepare the dishes which will be chiles rellenos, tamales, enchiladas and stews).  At the moment, she does not have the necessary money to invest in the business.  She plans to repay the loan with the salary she earns working as an Administrative Assistant in a transportation firm.  She wants to start this new business to help a girlfriend employing her so that both of them can get ahead and help each other with their family economies.

loans.use: to start a business selling Mexican food.

loans.name: Luciano Javier

texts.es: Luciano de 47 años de edad es casado, habita en una comarca de Nueva Guinea donde se dedica al cuido de su pequeña finca. Solicita refinaciamiento a la institución de AFODENIC, para el establecimiento de pasto mejorado variedad taiwán el cual utilizara para comercializar y para asegurar la alimentación de sus propios animalitos en verano y mantener ganado de calidad, en producción de leche y carne, sus ingreso durante el año son de la producción de la finca, en su crédito anterior cancela en tiempo y forma demostrado mucha responsabilidad con sus compromisos adquiridos.  Su mayor sueño es poder mantener bien cuidado el patrimonio de su familia para que cuando el falte les quede un medio de trabajo.
texts.en: Luciano, 47, is married and lives in Nueva Guinea where he works his small farm.  He’s asking AFODENIC for financing to plant better pasture grass of the Taiwan variety that he’ll sell and also assure the feeding of his own animals in summer to keep good quality cattle in milk and meat production.  His annual income all comes from the farm’s production.  He repaid his previous loan in a timely fashion showing much responsibility with respect to his acquired commitments.  His greatest wish is to be able to care for his family’s assets so that when he’s no longer here they will have a way to earn their livelihood.

loans.use: to plant grass.

loans.name: Las Cinco Rosas Group

texts.es:
La señora Maribel Catarina es soltera, tiene 20 años de años de edad, estudio los estudios de primaria, trabaja en tejeduría, inicio el negocio con su mamá y lleva 4 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de hilo para tejer perrajes de lana, y de todo tipo de material. Espera ver en el futuro que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Maribel Catarina, age 20, is single and has an elementary school education.  She works in the art of weaving.  She started the business with her mother, and she has four years of experience.

She organized a group in order to be able to request a loan to buy yarn to weave shawls from wood and all types of materials.

She hopes to see her business grow in the future.

loans.use: to buy yarn to make shawls.

loans.name: Meuling Elizabeth

texts.es: Meuling de 31 años de edad es casada, tiene una trabajo donde devenga un salario, ademas cuenta con su propio negocio de venta de ropa usada y nueva, negocio el cual maneja en su propia casa. Solicita su 1er crédito a la institución de AFODENIC para realizar compra de productos de su pequeño negocio, pues como tiene demanda de otras comerciantes que viajan a  las diferentes  colonias del municipio a vender estos articulos necesita consolidar mas su inventario para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes que la visitan. cuenta con el apoyo de su marido que aporta en los gastos del hogar, y que ademas es dueño de un taller de mecanica. Su mayor sueño es aumentar el inventario de su negocio para en el futuro poder dedicarse a el y no trabajar a otras instituciones.
texts.en: Meuling, 31, is married and works for a firm.  She also has her own business selling new and used clothes, a business she runs from home.  She’s asking AFODENIC for her first loan to buy products for her small business because she has orders from other merchants that go to various neighborhoods in town to sell these items so she needs to better consolidate her inventory to meet customer demand.  Her husband supports her efforts and contributes toward household expenses; he also owns an auto repair shop.  Her greatest dream is to increase the inventory in her business so that in the future she can dedicate herself just to it and not work for other institutions.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Napoleon

texts.es: Napoleon de 49 años es soltero, trabaja en su propio negocio de Cyber café, el cual esta ubicado cerca del parque central de Nueva Guinea donde ofrece a sus clientes servicio de internet y taypeo de trabajos, encolocado de material didactico y venta de articulos escolares. Esta solicitando su 1er crédito a la institución de AFODENIC, para invertirlo en compra de equipos y articulos con el objetivo de equiparlo mejor y darle mayor calidad de atencion a sus usuarios, que en su mayoria son estudiante de secundaria y universitarios. Napoleon se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable, con mucho deseo de superación.  Su mayor sueño es poder ver su negocio bien establecido para dejarle a su familia mejores oportunidades de crecer.
texts.en:
Napoleon, 49, is single and works in his own Internet café business located near Nueva Granada’s central park where he offers his customers Internet access service, typing services, school project binding and the sale of school supplies.  

He’s asking for his first loan from AFODENIC to invest in equipment and articles to better equip it and provide better quality attention to his users who for the most part are high school and university students.  

Napoleon is noted for being a hardworking, responsible man with a strong drive to succeed.  His greatest dream is to be able to see his business be well established to leave his family better growth opportunities.

loans.use: to buy equipment.

loans.name: Berman Martin

texts.es: Berman Martin de 32 años de edad es casado, habita junto a su familia compuesta por su esposa y sus 2 niñas que actualmente cursan la primaria. Don Berman esta solicitando su 3er credito con el objetivo de construir un muro en su casa pra evitar que su patio se llene de agua cuando llueve, ya que no quiere que sus hijas se le enfermen por la humedad.
texts.en: Berman Martin is 32 years old, married and lives with his family composed of his wife and two children going to elementary school.  Berman is asking for his 3rd loan to build a wall at home to prevent his yard from flooding when it rains because he does not want his daughters to become ill due to the dampness.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seeds and manure.

loans.name: Maria Angelina

texts.es:
La señora Maria Angelina es soltera, tiene 23 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la tejeduría y al comercio ya que tiene una tienda de consumo diario, lleva 1 años de experiencia, inició su negocio con pocos productos.

Solicita un préstamo para compra de productos para la venta: aguas gaseosas, galletas, dulces, jugos y mas, espera en el futuro tener mas producto para la venta.
texts.en: María Angelina is single and 23 years old.  She never went to school.  She’s a weaver and merchant.   She has a grocery store and one year experience having started her store with just a few products.  She’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise to sell: water, soft-drinks, cookies, candy, juice and more.  She hopes in future to have more products to sell.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase thread for weaving.

loans.name: Cumbe (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Cumbe esta formado por 14 mujeres, quienes laboran en diferentes actividades en su parroquia o en la ciudad de Cuenca, sus trabajos les permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares y también darles a sus hijos un ejemplo de esfuerzo y trabajo. Viven en la parroquia de Cumbe, lugar que  de clima frió y de hermosos paisajes, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, tienen una gran variedad en su gastronomía y su gente es de un corazón muy cálido.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Sra. Laura, tiene 34 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 19, 16, 15, 12, 10 años de edad y todos estudian. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Laura se dedica a la cría y venta de  pollos y cerdos a los cuales los vende en su comunidad. Como pasa en casa ella no se descuida de su familia. 

En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 8 años beneficiándose de los créditos en su hogar y  en su negocio. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cerdos y  alimento para animales.

Su meta es continuar con su negocio y que  sus hijos salgan adelante en sus estudios.

Las dos fotos pequeñas adjuntas son de dos socias que por notivos familiares no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomó la foto del rupo.
texts.en:
The Cumbe Communal Bank is 14 women who work in different jobs in their parish or in the city of Cuenca.  Their jobs allow them to contribute to the finances of the home and also to be an example of effort and work for their children.  They live in the parish of Cumbe, an area of cold climate and pretty landscapes.  The people there work in business, raising animals, and agriculture.

Laura, 34, is one of the members of this group.  She is married and from this marriage has five children, ages 19, 16, 15, 12, and 10, all of whom are in school.

Her husband works in construction as a mason.  The house she lives in is her property.

Laura raises and sells chickens and pigs, which she sells in her community.  Since she works at home, she does not neglect her family.

She has been benefitting from loans from the communal bank for eight years, in her home and in her business.  She's going to use the new loan to buy chickens, pigs, and animal feed.

Her goal is to continue with her business and for her children to get ahead in their studies.

The two small attached photographs are of two members who for family reasons were unable to be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy chickens, pigs, and animal feed.

loans.name: Julia Santos

texts.es:
La señora Julia Santos es casada, tiene 32 años de edad, cursó los estudios de educación primaria,  tiene 2 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio este trabajo como operaria y hasta ahora lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien la apoya económicamente.

Solicita un préstamo para ampliación de capital en la compra de hilos de diferentes clases y colores para el tejidos de cortes típicos, espera en el futuro contar con trabajadores.
texts.en: Julia Santos is married.  She’s 32 years old and completed elementary school.  She has two children who are in school.  She weaves traditional fabrics.  She started this work as an employee and now has five years’ experience.  Her husband supports her efforts and helps her economically.  She’s asking for a loan to increase capital buying yarn of various types and colors to weave traditional fabrics.  She hopes in future to have employees to help her.

loans.use: to buy yarn.

loans.name: Regina Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Regina Antonia  es casada, tiene 46 años de edad, estudio los estudios de primaria, tiene 6 hijos los cuales 3 de ellos estudian, se dedica a la tejeduría al tejido de cortes típicos, inició este trabajo como operaria y hasta el momento lleva 12 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo se de su esposo quien se dedica a la albañilería.

Solicita un préstamo para usarlo para comprar un telar e hilos para que su negocio sea mas productivo, espera e el futuro contar con mas trabajadores para su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Regina Antonia is 46 years old and married. She completed primary school, has 6 children of which 3 are in school. 

She makes a living weaving the fabric for traditional skirts. She began this work as a worker and now has 12 years of experience.She also has the support of her husband who makes a living as a bricklayer.

She is requesting a loan to use it in the purchase of a loom and thread so that her business can be more productive. In the future she hopes to have more workers for her business.

loans.use: to buy a loom and thread.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
La señora Elena  es casada, tiene 39 años D. edad, tiene 7 hijos 4 D. los cuales estudian, no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar, se dedica a la tejeduría, inició como operaria y hasta el momento lleva 3 años D. experiencia con este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo  para la compra D. hilos D. diferentes clases y colores, espe4ra en el futuro tener trabajadores en su negocio.
texts.en: Elena is married.  She’s 39 years old and has 7 children four of which are in school.  She never had the opportunity to go to school.  She’s a weaver.  She started as an employee and now has three years’ experience with this work.  Her husband, who does the same kind of work, supports her efforts.  She’s asking for a loan to buy yarn in assorted types and colors.  In future she hopes to have employees in her business.

loans.use: to buy weaving supplies.

loans.name: María Esperanza

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Libertad en Progreso, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia Victoria del Portete (Cuenca), este lugar es de clima frió y propicio para la cría de ganado por sus amplias llanuras, su gente es muy amable, cálida y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña María tiene 35 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 17, 14, 5 y 3 años de edad, su primer hijo trabaja y le ayuda económicamente y también  estudia en un colegio a distancia, su segundo hijo estudia en el colegio y su tercer hijo está en el jardín de infantes. Su esposo labora en cualquier trabajo que le salga al día como albañil, pintor etc., no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de un familiar.

La Señora. María se dedica al cuidado de sus hijos y como pasa en casa cría y vende  pollos, cuyes, vacas y borregos. También labora en la agricultura y lo que le produce es  solo para el consumo de su hogar. Como pasa en casa la mayor parte del tiempo se dedica a bordar, esta actividad  aprendió trabajando. 

Se encuentra en su octavo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de telas para el bordado y en alimento para sus animales.
 
Su meta es tener un negocio de venta de polleras (faldas).
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Libertad en Progreso” communal bank.  She lives in a community belonging to Victoria del Portete (Cuenca) Parish.  This is a cold climate place apt for raising livestock on its wide plains.  Its residents are kind, warm and keep the customs and traditions of their peoples.

María is 35 years old and has four children who are 17, 14, 5 and 3 years of age.  Her oldest son works and helps out economically while also studying at a distance high school.  Her second son is in secondary school and her third son is in Kindergarten.  Her husband works at whatever job comes up as a bricklayer, painter, etc.  She does not own a house but lives in a family member’s house.

She cares for her children and since she stays home she raises chickens, guinea pigs, cows and sheep to sell.  She also farms but what she grows is only for home consumption.  Since she spends most of her time at home she also embroiders, a skill she learned working.

She’s in her 8th loan with the communal bank and the new one will be invested in the purchase of fabric to embroider and to buy animal feed.  Her goal is to have a business selling ‘polleras’ (skirts).

loans.use: to buy fabric and animal feed.

loans.name: Luz Melida

texts.es:
La Señorita. Luz es socia del banco comunal Libertad en Progreso, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia Victoria del Portete (Cuenca), este lugar es de clima frió y propicio para la cría de ganado por sus amplias llanuras, su gente es muy amable, cálida y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señorita. Luz tiene 32 años es soltera, vive con sus padres compartiendo los gastos del hogar, su mamá se dedica a la cría de animales y su papá labora como albañil, la casa en la que vive es propiedad de sus padres.

Nuestra socia se dedica al bordado hace 8 años, trabaja en su casa y solo bajo pedido. También cría ganado y cuyes.

En el banco comunal se encuentra en su cuarto ciclo y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de telas, hilos y otros materiales de bordado para continuar con su trabajo. 

Su meta es tener más animales para la cría.
texts.en:
Luz is a member of the “Libertad en Progreso” communal bank.  She lives in a community belonging to Victoria del Portete (Cuenca) Parish.  This is a cold climate place apt for raising livestock on its wide plains.  Its residents are kind, warm and keep the customs and traditions of their peoples.

Luz is 32 years old, single and lives with her parents sharing household expenses.  Her mother raises animals and her father works as a bricklayer.  The house they live in belongs to her parents.

Luz has been embroidering for 8 years.  She works from home and only based on prior orders.  She also raises livestock and guinea pigs.

The communal bank is in its 4th loan and the new loan will be used to buy fabric, thread and other embroidery supplies to continue with her work.  Her goal is to have more animals to raise.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and other embroidery supplies.

loans.name: Mercedes Dolores

texts.es:
La Señora. Dolores es socia del banco comunal Libertad en Progreso, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia Victoria del Portete (Cuenca), este lugar es de clima frió y propicio para la cría de ganado por sus amplias llanuras, su gente es muy amable, cálida y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Dolores tiene 45 años, es casada en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos, 2 de sus hijas son casadas e independientes, 3 trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, y sus dos últimos hijos estudian en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo es de profesión sastre y tiene un pequeño taller, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.

Doña Dolores se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar, cuida de su familia y cómo pasa el mayor parte del tiempo en casa se dedica a la cría de animales como: cuyes, gallinas, borregos y vacas, vende sus animales en su comunidad o en la ciudad cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica.

En el banco comunal se encuentra en su cuarto crédito y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en telas para el negocio de su esposo y también en el alimento para sus animales.
 
Su meta es construir una casa para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Dolores is a member of the “Libertad en Progreso” communal bank.  She lives in a community belonging to Victoria del Portete (Cuenca) Parish.  This is a cold climate place apt for raising livestock on its wide plains.  Its residents are kind, warm and keep the customs and traditions of their peoples.

Dolores is 45 years old, married and has 7 children.  Two of her daughters are married and independent, three work and help out economically.  Her two youngest children go to the local elementary school.  Her husband’s a tailor by profession and has a small workshop.  They own the house they live in.

Dolores does the household chores, takes care of her family but since she spends most of the time at home she also raises animals like guinea pigs, chickens, sheep and cows that she sells in her community or in the city when an economic need arises.

She’s in her fourth loan with the communal bank and will use this new loan to buy fabric for her husband’s business and also feed for her animals.  Her goal is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to buy fabric and animal feed.

loans.name: Lubna

texts.en:
Lubna is a 34-year-old young woman. She is married and has three sons. Her husband has a store for selling generators where there is high demand for generators. This is the only source of income for the family. Lubna wants to help her husband in the purchase of more generators for sale but she does not have enough money so she needs to take a loan from FATEN. When Lubna gets the loan, which is repaid on a monthly basis, she will be able to help her husband to sell more, increase his income and provide his family with better living conditions. Lubna is a conservative woman so her husband is photographed instead next to his store.


About this loan product:
 FATEN offers loan products that are designed to serve borrowers all over Palestine, including some religiously conservative areas. A key tenet of Islam is the prohibition of interest in the lending or accepting of money. This prohibition is based on the belief that money should be seen only as a medium of exchange and that it has no value in itself. FATEN has adapted the terms of this loan to fit the cultural context by attaching a 0% interest rate to the loan. In order to cover its costs, FATEN does charge a servicing fee. The amount you see fundraising includes both the principal loan and the loan servicing fees. As with all Kiva loans, you should expect to have your funds returned to you in accordance with the repayment schedule attached to this loan. For more information on lending in the Muslim world, please visit Kiva's Muslim World Lending helptext: http://tinyurl.com/3aekx8m.

loans.use: To purchase more generators for sale.

loans.name: Hiba

texts.en: Hiba is a 29-year-old, married woman from Gaza who lives with her husband and three children, two of whom are in school. Hiba decided that she would like to open her own salon. She hopes that with this loan she will be able to buy all the beauty products she needs for the salon. She believes that this loan will enable her to start her own business and that this will help her family financially.

loans.use: to buy all the beauty products she needs for her salon

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 36-year-old, married man from Gaza. He lives with his wife and four children, three of whom are in school. Currently, Ahmad needs to help his family financially as his children are now in school and their needs have increased. He decided to take this loan to open a supermarket. He hopes that this loan will enable him to buy the necessary things for the supermarket and groceries as well. He hopes that by starting his own business he and his family will be living a better life.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more office supplies to increase profit

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more merchandise to increase profit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: Adil

texts.en:
Adil is married and has 4 children. He sells groceries from his food store. His vending location is well known for good prices that are lower than market prices. Adil knows his customers’ preferences and always offers them only good quality groceries. He has been in the grocery trade for about 5 years. His business has been marked with consistent stability and his income per month is about 600 USD.

Adil is hoping to invest a loan of 1,100 AZN in additional merchandise, which will help him increase his turnover capital and improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise to increase income.

loans.name: Hortencia María

texts.es:
La Señora. Hortensia es socia del banco comunal Bella Vista, vive por una comunidad que  pertenece al a parroquia Victoria del Portete (Cuenca), está localizada al sur de la Capital Azuaya, lleva su nombre en honor a la batalla ocurrida en sus campos, precisamente en las faldas del cerro Portete el 27 de Febrero de 1829. Su gente mantiene las tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedican a la cría de animales y a la agricultura.

Doña Hortensia tiene 62 años, vive en unión libre y fruto de esa unión ha concebido 8 hijos quienes son todos mayores de edad, seis de ellos son casados e independientes, sus dos hijos solteros trabajan y  le ayudan económicamente.  Su esposo labora en varias actividades o en las que les ofrezcan trabajo, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 

La Señora. Hortensia se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y como pasa en casa  tiene tiempo para criar ganado, cuyes y gallinas. También labora en la agricultura y lo que cultiva es solo para el consumo de su hogar.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal  al cual fue invitada por una vecina, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ganado.
 
Su meta es tener más ganado y crecer en esta actividad.
texts.en:
Hortensia is a member of the Bella Vista communal bank.  She lives in a community belonging to Victoria del Portete (Cuenca) Parish located south of the Azuaya capital.  Its name is in honor of a battle that took place in its fields precisely on the skirts of the Portete Hill on 27 February 1829.  Its residents maintain the traditions of its peoples and they raise livestock and farm.

Hortensia is 62 years old and lives in a common law relationship.  She has 8 children who are all adults now.  Six of them are married and independent. Her two single children work and help out economically.   Her husband works in various activities or at jobs he’s offered.  They do not own a house; they are renters.

Hortensia does the household chores and since she stays home she has time to raise livestock, guinea pigs and chickens.  She also farms but everything she grows is only for home consumption.

This is the first loan she’s taken out in the communal bank that she was invited to join by a neighbor.  She will use the loan to buy livestock.  Her goal is to have more livestock and to grow in this activity.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Piedad Asucena

texts.es:
La Señora. Piedad es socia del banco comunal Bella Vista, vive por una comunidad que  pertenece al a parroquia Victoria del Portete (Cuenca), esta localizada al sur de la Capital Azuaya, lleva su nombre en honor a la batalla ocurrida en sus campos, precisamente en las faldas del cerro Portete el 27 de Febrero de 1829. Su gente mantiene las tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedican a la cría de animales y a la agricultura.

La Señora. Piedad tiene 23 años, vive en unión libre y fruto de esa unión ha concebido una hija de 3 años de edad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de un familiar.
 
Nuestra socia se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y a cuidar de su hija que aun esta pequeña, como pasa en casa se dedica a críar animales como: cuyes y ganado. También labora en la agricultura y lo que cosecha  es para el consumo de su casa y el sobrante lo vende. 

Es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para iniciar en esta actividad.
 
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Sra. Piedad is a member of the Communal Bank “Bella Vista”. She lives in a community that is part of the parish of Victoria del Portete (Cuenca), which is located to the south of the capital of Azuaya. This area is named in honor of a field battle that took place at the foothill of Portete on February 27, 1829. The people have maintained the local traditions and earn their living by raising animals and farming.

Sra. Piedad is 23 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has a three-year-old daughter. Her husband works as a private employee. They do not own a home, so they live at the house of a relative.

Piedad spends her time performing the household chores and taking care of her daughter who is still small. She also raises animals such as guinea pigs and cattle. Piedad also engages in farming. Her harvest is for household consumption and the surplus is sold.

This is her first loan with the Communal Bank and the money will be invested in the purchase of chickens so that she can start this activity. Her goal is to have a home of her own.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Lizeth Andreina

texts.es:
La Señorita. Lizeth Hortensia es socia del banco comunal Bella Vista, vive por una comunidad que pertenece al a parroquia Victoria del Portete (Cuenca), esta localizada al sur de la Capital Azuaya, lleva su nombre en honor a la batalla ocurrida en sus campos, precisamente en las faldas del cerro Portete el 27 de Febrero de 1829. Su gente mantiene las tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedican a la cría de animales y a la agricultura.

La Señorita. Lizeth tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera y vive con sus padres, su papá se dedica a laborar en varias actividades y su mamá trabaja en la cría de animales específicamente en la de ganado. No tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 

Nuestra socia pasa en casa y se dedica la cría de animales como: cuyes, pollos y ganado a los cuales los vende en su comunidad o en las ferias de la ciudad.

Este es su primer crédito  y lo va a invertir en la compra de ganado y en alimento para el mismo.
 
Su meta es  ingresar a la universidad y ser profesional en la rama de la medicina.
texts.en:
Srta. Lizeth Hortensia is a member of the Communal Bank “Bella Vista”. She lives in a community that is part of the parish of Victoria del Portete (Cuenca), which is located to the south of the capital of Azuaya. This area is named in honor of a field battle that took place at the foothill of Portete on February 27, 1829. The people have maintained the local traditions and earn their living by raising animals and farming.

Srta. Lizeth is 21 years old, single, and lives with her parents. Her father works in various activities and her mother raises animals, especially cattle. They do not own a home, so they live in a rental property.

Lizeth spends her time at home raising animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and cattle and then sells them in her community or at the fairs in the city. This is her first loan and she will use the money to invest in cattle and the appropriate feed. Her goal is to enroll in the university and become a professional in the field of medicine.

loans.use: to buy cattle and the appropriate feed.

loans.name: Alegría Concepción

texts.es:
En  la ciudadela 30 de Septiembre del cantón Rocafuerte (Portoviejo) se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Plazoleta Eloy Alfaro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora Alegría, tiene 62 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad e independientes. El esposo se dedica a la agricultura. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 13 ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que le brinda la institución.

Ella realiza el crédito para ayudar a su esposo el cual se dedica a la agricultura, tiene cultivos de ciclo corto como son el maíz, pimiento y tomates, él trabaja de seis a siete horas en el cuidado y riego de los cultivos mientras que ella se dedica al hogar y a la  cría de pollos y gallinas criollas,  a ella esto no le quita mayor tiempo y se entretiene con sus animalitos. Los cultivos cuando están de cosecha los llevan a entregar al mercado mayorista en Portoviejo.

Este crédito es para comprar abonos, fertilizantes así como también alimento para los pollos. 

Su sueño es tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Plazoleta Eloy Alfaro” meets every 15 days in the September 30th neighborhood of the canton of Rocafuerte (Portoviejo). This place is known for its delicious sweets that are prepared by the locals and known throughout the entire country.

Sra. Alegría lives in this place. She is 62 years old, married, and has four children who are grown and independent. Her husband is a farmer. Alegría has been with the Communal Bank for 13 loan cycles and enjoys the assistance she has received from the organization.

She is requesting a loan to help her husband with his farming activities. He grows short-cycle crops such as corn, peppers, and tomatoes. Her husband works six to seven hours caring for and irrigating his crops while she takes care of the household and raises native chickens. Her animals keep her entertained and do not require a great amount of time. When her husband’s crops are harvested, they will be taken to the wholesale market in Portoviejo.

This loan will be used to buy compost, fertilizers, and also feed for her chickens. Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, and poultry feed.

loans.name: Nancy María

texts.es:
En  la ciudadela 30 de Septiembre del cantón Rocafuerte (Portoviejo) se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Plazoleta Eloy Alfaro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Nancy, ella tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 18 y 14 años de edad los mismos que estudian en universidad y colegio. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

Ella para ganar algo por sus propios medios se dedica al comercio, tiene un bazar en el centro de Rocafuerte, en el cual además de artículos de bazar también vende flores y arreglos florales naturales, trabaja todos los días desde las 8h30 hasta las 18h00, trabaja sola aunque a veces requiere de ayuda y contrata a una persona . Lleva con su negocio  13 años y le va bastante bien.

Este crédito lo va  a invertir en comprar artículos de bazar, pero sobretodo flores ya que se acercan el día de los santos difuntos y por lo general se venden muchas flores en estos días. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal,  es la presidenta y le gusta por la unión del grupo que es como una familia.
 
Sus sueños son tener un local propio ya que el que tiene es arrendado y terminar de arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Plazoleta Eloy Alfaro” meets every 15 days in the September 30th neighborhood of the canton of Rocafuerte (Portoviejo). This place is known for its delicious sweets that are prepared by the locals and known throughout the entire country.

It is in this place that one can meet Sra. Nancy. She is 43 years old, married, and has two children (ages 18 and 14) who are studying at the university and a high school respectively. Her husband is a farmer.

Nancy is able to earn some income through her own means by working in the retail trade. She has a bazaar in the central part of Rocafuerte. In addition to the products in her bazaar, she also sells flowers and natural flower arrangements. Nancy works every day from 8:30am to 6pm. She works alone but sometimes she needs help and must hire another person. Nancy has been in business for 13 years and has done well.

This loan will be invested in products for her bazaar, but mostly flowers to be delivered on the day of the departed saints. In general, she sells many flowers on these days. Nancy is a founding member of the Communal Bank, where she serves as president. She likes the unity of her group because it feels like a family.

Her dreams are to have her own shop since she currently rents her location and to finish the renovation of her house.

loans.use: to buy products for her bazaar and flowers to sell.

loans.name: Lucia Milerna

texts.es:
En  la ciudadela 30 de Septiembre del cantón Rocafuerte (Portoviejo) se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Plazoleta Eloy Alfaro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora Lucia, tiene 48 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, uno mayor de edad y  dos de 16 y 10  años los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido se dedica a la agricultura. Está en el Banco Comunal  8 ciclos y le gusta por los beneficios que le brinda la institución.

Ella es una mujer muy luchadora que realiza el crédito para ayudar su marido con los gastos que representa mantener un hogar, ella se dedica a la cría de gallinas criollas y pollos de granja pero además de esto el crédito también lo utiliza para los cultivos del cual se encarga su marido, él tiene sembríos de  melón, sandia y ciertas verduras como habas, frejoles entre otras cosas. Trabajan todos los días ya que ella además de cuidar  su hogar y a sus animalitos también le ayuda de vez en cuando en el campo a su marido.  Cuando sus productos están de cosecha los comerciantes llegan hasta sus sembríos  y llevan los productos que compran a entregar al mayoreo.
P>
Este crédito es para comprar fertilizantes, comida y medicinas para los pollos e insumos  agrícolas.
 
Su sueño es ver que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Plazoleta Eloy Alfaro” meets every 15 days in the September 30th neighborhood of the canton of Rocafuerte (Portoviejo). This place is known for its delicious sweets that are prepared by the locals and known throughout the entire country.

Sra. Lucia lives in this place. She is 48 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has three children. One child is an adult and the other two, ages 16 and 10, are attending school. Her husband is a farmer. Lucia has been with the Communal Bank for eight loan cycles and enjoys the benefits that the organization has provided.

Lucia is a determined woman who is obtaining this loan so that she can help her husband with the household expenses. She raises native chickens but she will also use this loan for her husband’s crops. He grows melons, watermelons, and certain vegetables such as different types of beans and other products. They work every day. In addition to taking care of the house and her animals, Lucia also helps her husband in the fields. When their products are ready to be harvested, the merchants will come to buy their crops so that they can be delivered to the wholesale market.

This loan will be used to buy fertilizers, farming supplies, feed, and medicines for the chickens. Lucia’s dream is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, farming supplies, poultry feed, and medicines.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice mill business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 11 years. She earns more income from farming rice.

Lydia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase materials and equipment for her rice mill business. 

 She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To purchase materials for rice mill maintenance.

loans.name: Koy

texts.en:
Mrs. Koy is a 35-year-old married woman who has been living in the Pouk district of Siem Reap province, Cambodia. Presently she lives with her husband and four children. One of her children has started a new family and is living away from home. 

Koy earns a living by selling a mix of products in a small store near her house, such as groceries, packaged foods, sweets, canned foods and other products. She has run this business smoothly because she has many customers who come to buy her products every day. She typically makes around $5USD per day. She also gets income from her husband and her two daughters who work hard in the construction field with the men. 

Now she lacks capital to buy more products to sell. Therefore, she would like to request some funds from Kiva through HKL to purchase an additional stock of goods for continuing her business. With the rest of the loan, she wishes to buy some piglets for raising to make more income for the family. In the future, Koy hopes she’ll be able to raise their standard of living and to enlarge her business to be bigger than before.

loans.use: to purchase an additional stock of goods.

loans.name: Romulo Jr.

texts.en:
Romulo is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. He has been in this business for 25 years. He earns more income from farming sugarcane and fishing.

He has been sustaining his business activities through his own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. He is borrowing PHP 45,000 through NWTF to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle transport business.

Romulo dreams of saving enough money to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: To purchase materials for motorcycle maintenance.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.en:
Filomena is 71 years old and married with 9 children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

She has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, noodles and other groceries. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Doeur

texts.en:
Mrs. Doeur is a conscientious and hardworking person who lives in Kompong Thom. She is 36 years old and the mother of five children, all of whom are single and live together with her and her husband. Currently Doeur works in a local rubber plantation field with two of her children. She has been engaged in this job since 2010 and she gets her salary monthly. Normally she can earn an average of $2.50 per day to support their living and cover household expenses. 

She has difficulty with transportation. She said, “Every day my children and I go to work by hiring a motor-taxi service, and sometimes we have to walk if we don’t have enough money for the transportation fee.” For this reason, Mrs. Doeur is seeking a loan from Kiva to purchase a second motorcycle for use in the family. She said that this fund would help her reduce transportation expenses and increase their income for living. For the future, she hopes she can send her children to finish at least high school level.

loans.use: to purchase a second motorcycle for use in the family.

loans.name: Kdoep

texts.en:
Kdoep (pictured above), 45, is a fisherman. His wife, Srey, is 41 years old and stays at home doing housework. They have been married since 1985 and have six children - one son and five daughters. One is married and lives outside the family home, two are garment workers, two assist their parents in a farming business and another one is in school. The family lives in a small village off of National Road Number Two about seventeen kilometers south of Phnom Penh City.

Kdoep is requesting a loan in the amount of $500 to purchase fishing materials for his fishing business.

loans.use: To purchase fishing materials for his fishing business.

loans.name: Rowel

texts.en:
Rowel is 26 years old. He was not able to finish his education because he was engaged into early marriage. He is now blessed with a child. Being the head of the family, he needs to work hard to provide sustenance for his family. His primary source of income comes from rice farming. He plants and harvests rice and later sells to traders in the village. Aside from farming, he also generates an income by raising hogs to fatten and sell.

Rowel is now requesting a loan amount of P10,000 to have additional capital to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. He hopes this loan will help improve his crop production.

He would like to keep generating income to provide a better quality of life for his family someday.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional stocks of rice and feeds to sell.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a sari-sari (variety) store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 9 years.

Elsa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of goods to sell in her variety store. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of goods to sell in her variety store.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is married with 2 child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 49 years old and has 1 child who is in school.

She has a motorcycle repair shop business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 4 years. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional tools and equipment for her repair shop.

In the future, Marcelina would like to save enough money so she could send her child to college.

loans.use: to buy additional tools and equipment for her repair shop.

loans.name: Roqueta

texts.en:
Roqueta is married with 2 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 33 years old and has 1 child who is in school.

She has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 3 years. Roqueta requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials for her abaca weaving. In the future, she would like to save money to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy materials for her abaca weaving.

loans.name: Candida

texts.en:
Candida is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buying and selling of vegetables business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 1 year. She earns more income from pig fattening.
